<p>80b.4</p>kyi mtha' rtogs pa dang / bag chags kyis mtshams sbyor ba nyid spangs pa can yin no/ /de lta bas na mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan ni gzhi dang gnyen po dang rnam pa thams cad bsdus pas mngon par rtogs pa ril rdzogs par bstan pa yin no/ /zhes bya ba 'di 'thad pa yin
<p>80b.5</p>no/ /skye bo blo gros dman pa dag bcom ldan 'das rgyas pa dang 'bring dang mdor bsdus pa la dad pa'i sems can la phan 'dogs par bzhed pa thugs rje can nyid kyis rgyal ba'i yum de dang de las mngon par rtogs pa brgyad kyi rim pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don mtha'
<p>80b.6</p>dag gsal bar mdzad pa ma yin nam/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa ma rgyal ba las rgyal bas yang de bstan pa la don ci zhig yod snyam du dogs pa bsal ba'i phyir/ don la the tshom bskyed pa nyid kyis 'jug pa'i yan lag rang gi bstan bcos kyi brjod par bya ba dang / 
<p>80b.7</p>dgos pa dang dgos pa'i yang dgos pa dang 'brel ba khong na yod pa rnams gsungs te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen nyid lam/ /ston pas 'di la bshad pa gang / /gzhan gyis myong ba ma yin te/ /chos spyod bcu yi bdag nyid kyi/ /mdo don dran pa la bzhag nas/ /
<p>81a</p>
<p>81a.1</p>blo dang ldan pas mthong 'gyur phyir/ /bde blag tu ni rtogs pa zhes/ /bya ba rtsom pa'i dgos pa yin/ /zhes bya ba yin no/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni sangs rgyas nyid kyi lam ste mngon par rtogs pa thams cad nye bar mtshon pa lhur
<p>81a.2</p>len pa yin no/ /bcom ldan 'das cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum gyis 'gro ba mtha' dag la rjes su ston par mdzad pa de nyid kyis rgyal ba'i yum rnam pa gsum car las brjod par bya ba nyid du bstan pa gang yin pa / rjod par byed pa dang brjod par bya ba dag thabs dang thabs
<p>81a.3</p>kyis bsgrub par bya ba'i tshul gyis 'brel par mdzad pa phyi rol pa dang cig shos kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba la sogs pa chos thams cad bdag med pa la goms par ma byas pa rnams kyis thos pa las byung ba la sogs pa'i shes pa skye ba'i rim gyis ma myangs pa ste/ byang chub
<p>81a.4</p>sems dpa' rang dang gzhan gyi don du phun sum tshogs pa sgrub pa ci la yang ma rag par chas pa dag kho nas nyams su myong ba shin tu gsal bas bzhag pa'i bag chags las byung ba'i dran pa'i shes pa la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mdo'i don ma lus pa mngon par
<p>81a.5</p>rtogs pa brgyad kyi bdag nyid byang chub kyi sems dang sbyin pa la sogs pa sgrub pa'i spyod pa legs par bzhag nas/ chos kyi dbyings kun du 'gro ba rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid sa rab tu dga' ba la sogs pa rtogs pa'i rim pas rnam pa thams cad mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ba zhes
<p>81a.6</p>bya ba dgos pa'i yang dgos pa'i yang ched du mngon par 'dod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don byang chub kyi sems dang sgrub pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid gdul bya rnams kyis bde blag tu rtogs par 'gyur ba ni bstan bcos rtsom pa'i dgos pa yin no/ /de ltar 'brel
<p>81a.7</p>pa la sogs pa bsnyad nas/ gdul bya rnams kyis bde blag tu rtogs par bya ba'i phyir dang / bstan bcos kyi don rnam par dbye ba byas pa yang ma 'dzings pa nyid kyis bshad pa sla bar gzigs nas tshig le'ur byas pa bco lngas mdo dang rgyas par bstan pas shes rab kyi
<p>81b</p>
<p>81b.1</p>pha rol tu phyin pa'i lus rnam par bzhag pa gsungs te/ shes rab pha rol phyin pa ni/ /dngos po brgyad kyis yang dag bshad/ /rnam kun mkhyen nyid lam shes nyid/ /de nas thams cad shes pa nyid/ /rnam kun mngon rdzogs rtogs pa dang / /rtse mor phyin dang
<p>81b.2</p>mthar gyis pa/ /skad cig gcig mngon rdzogs byang chub/ /chos kyi sku dang de rnam brgyad/ /sems bskyed pa dang gdams ngag dang / /nges 'byed yan lag rnam bzhi dang / /sgrub pa yi ni rten gyur pa/ /chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin dang / /dmigs pa dag dang ched
<p>81b.3</p>dang ni/ /go cha 'jug pa'i bya ba dang / /tshogs ni nges par 'byung bcas rnams/ /thub pa'i rnam kun mkhyen pa nyid/ /mog mog por byed la sogs dang / /slob ma bse ru'i lam gang dang / /'di dang gzhan pa'i yon tan gyis/ /phan yon che ba mthong ba'i lam/ /
<p>81b.4</p>byed pa dang ni mos pa dang / /bstod dang bkur dang bsngags pa dang / /bsngo dang rjes su yid rang ba/ /yid la byed pa bla med dag /sgrub dang shin tu dag pa zhes/ /bya ba 'di ni bsgom pa'i lam/ /byang chub sems dpa' mkhas rnams kyi/ /lam shes nyid ni de 'drar
<p>81b.5</p>bshad/ /shes pas srid la mi gnas shing / /snying rjes zhi la mi gnas dang / /thabs ma yin pas ring ba dang / /thabs kyis ring ba ma yin nyid/ /mi mthun gnyen po'i phyogs dag dang / /sbyor dang de yi mnyam nyid dang / /nyan thos la sogs mthong ba'i
<p>81b.6</p>lam/ /de 'dra kun shes nyid du 'dod/ /rnam pa sbyor bar bcas rnams dang / /yon tan skyon ni mtshan nyid bcas/ /thar dang nges 'byed cha mthun dang / /slob pa phyir mi ldog pa'i tshogs/ /srid dang zhi ba mnyam nyid dang / /zhing dag bla na med pa ni/ /rnam kun mngon
<p>81b.7</p>rdzogs rtogs pa ste/ /'di ni thabs mkhas bcas pa yin/ /de yi rtags dang rnam 'phel dang / /brtan dang sems kun gnas pa dang / /mthong zhes bya dang bsgom pa zhes/ /bya ba'i lam ni so so la/ /rnam par rtog pa rnam bzhi yi/ /gnyen po rnam pa
<p>82a</p>
<p>82a.1</p>bzhi dang ni/ /bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin/ /log par bsgrub dang bcas pa ni/ /rtse mo'i mngon rtogs mthar gyis pa/ /rnam gsum rnam bcu skad cig ma/ /gcig gis mngon rdzogs byang chub pa/ /mtshan nyid kyis ni rnam pa bzhi/ /
<p>82a.2</p>ngo bo nyid longs rdzogs bcas dang / /de bzhin gzhan pa sprul pa ni/ /chos sku mdzad pa dang bcas pa/ /rnam pa bzhir ni yang dag brjod/ /ces bya ba yin no/ /de la tshig le'ur byas pa dang po gnyis kyis ni dngos po brgyad bsdus pa'i phyir mdor bstan pa yin no/ /
<p>82a.3</p>tshig le'ur byas pa bcu gsum gyis ni de dag nyid kyi don bsdus nas rgyas par bshad de/ /de ltar na bsdus pa dang rgyas par bshad pa'i phyir legs par bshad pa yin no/ /bsdus pa'i don gyi tshig le'ur byas pa rnams ni/ bstan bcos mdzad pa nyid kyis/ sems
<p>82a.4</p>bskyed pa ni gzhan don phyir/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'chad par 'gyur ba'i bstan bcos mtha' dag gis 'chad pas/ de dag rnam par bshad pas bshad par bsams te/ zlos pa'i nyes par 'gyur du dogs nas rnam par ma bkrol lo/ /de ltar bsdus pa'i don
<p>82a.5</p>kun bstan nas/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub rjes su 'thob par 'dod pas 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya dgos pas/ dang por rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de sdud pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa rnam par bshad pa'i sgo nas bshad par
<p>82a.6</p>bzhed de/ sems bskyed pa rang gi ngo bo dmigs pa dang bcas pa/ sems bskyed pa ni gzhan don phyir/ /yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod/ /ces gsungs te/ sangs rgyas su grub nas gzhan gyi don gyi phyir skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du 'bad par bya'o zhes
<p>82a.7</p>sems bskyed pa gzhan gyi don du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod pa'i mtshan nyid smon pa dang 'jug pa'i ngo bo nyid rnam pa gnyis so/ /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod pa nyid ni de don du gnyer ba dge ba'i chos la 'dun pa sems las byung ba yin la/ sems
<p>82b</p>
<p>82b.1</p>bskyed pa ni sems yul khyad par du 'phags pa snang ba can 'byung ba ma yin nam/ ji ltar na de sems bskyed pa yin par 'gyur zhe na bden mod kyi/ 'on kyang 'dir dge ba'i chos la 'dun pa'i mtshan nyid don du gnyer ba yod na byang chub kyi sems bskyed pas rgyus [(]'bas [,]'bras [)]
<p>82b.2</p>bu bstan pa yin te/ de ltar don du gnyer ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i chos thams cad 'phel bar 'gyur ro zhes shes par bya ba'i phyir nye bar btags pa la rten pa yin pas nyes pa med do/ /rnam pa gcig tu na smon lam ni don du gnyer ba ste/ yang dag par rdzogs
<p>82b.3</p>pa'i byang chub 'dod pa nyid yin la/ de dang lhan cig spyod pa'i sems bskyed pa de'i sgrar bstan pa ni de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams la smon lam dang ldan pa'i sems de skye'o zhes bya bar shes par bya ba'i phyir yin no/ /yang gang 'dod pa'i bdag nyid dang / gang gi don du
<p>82b.4</p>sems bskyed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub de ni gang yin gzhan gyi don ni gang yin zhe na/ de dang de ni mdo bzhin du/ /bsdus dang rgyas pa'i sgo nas brjod/ /ces bya ba gsungs te / rgyal ba'i yum rnam pa gsum car las kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin
<p>82b.5</p>pa la sogs pa thams cad la sbyin par bya ba dang / sbyin pa po dang len pa po la sogs pa mi dmigs par bsgrub par bya'o zhes shes par byed pa'i don can dang / sems can thams cad skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du mya ngan las 'das pa dang / ser sna can la sogs pa rnams
<p>82b.6</p>sbyin pa la sogs pa la dgod par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa rab tu ston pa lhur byed pa'i ngag gis mdo'i don dang mi 'gal bar bsdus pa dang rgyas pa'i sgo nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang gzhan gyi don
<p>82b.7</p>bstan te/ de ltar na sems bskyed pa ni gzhan gyi don gyi phyir yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod pa'i bdag nyid yin par shes par bya'o/ /gtsug lag gi gzhung skabs kyi don ston pa lhur len pa ni thams cad las kyang gsungs mod kyi tshig mangs su dogs nas
<p>83a</p>
<p>83a.1</p>khungs nyid du ma bris so/ /de ltar sems bskyed pa dmigs pa dang rang gi ngo bo dang bcas pa brjod nas/ da ni de'i rab tu dbye ba rnam pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa/ de yang sa gser zla ba me/ /gter dang rin chen 'byung
<p>83a.2</p>gnas mtsho/ /rdo rje ri sman bshes gnyen dang / /yid bzhin nor bu nyi ma glu/ /rgyal po mdzod dang lam po che/ /bzhon pa bkod ma'i chu dang ni/ /sgra snyan chu bo sprin rnams kyis/ /rnam pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis so/ /zhes bya ba dag gis bshad de/ 'dun pa dang / bsam pa
<p>83a.3</p>dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / sbyor ba dang / sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / thabs mkhas pa dang / smon lam dang / stobs dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / 
<p>83a.4</p>bsod nams dang / ye shes dang / byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos dang / snying rje dang lhag mthong dang / gzungs dang / spobs pa dang / chos kyi dga' ston dang / bgrod pa gcig pa'i lam dang / chos kyi sku dang ldan pa ni/ go rims bzhin du sa dang / gser
<p>83a.5</p>bzang po dang / zla ba tshes pa dang / me dang / gter chen po dang / rin po che'i 'byung khungs kyi gnas dang / rgya mtsho chen po dang / rdo rje dang / ri'i rgyal po dang / sman dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang / nyi ma dang / chos kyi sgra dbyangs snyan pa
<p>83a.6</p>dang / /rgyal po chen po dang / bang mdzod dang / lam po che dang / bzhon pa dang / bkod ma'i chu dang / sgra snyan pa dang / chu bo'i rgyun dang / sprin lta bu ste/ chos dkar po thams cad kyi gzhi'i dngos po dang / byang chub kyi bar du mi 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i chos mtha'
<p>83a.7</p>dag rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gsum gyi sgrib pa'i bud shing sreg pa dang / sems can thams cad tshim par byed pa dang / yon tan rin po che'i rten gyi dngos po dang / mi 'dod pa thams cad thog tu bab pas mi 'khrugs pa dang / yid 
<p>83b</p>
<p>83b.1</p>ches pa brtan pas mi phyed pa dang / dmigs pa'i rnam par g.yeng bas mi bskyod pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa'i nad rab tu zhi ba dang / gnas skabs thams cad du sems can gyi don yongs su mi gtong ba dang / ji ltar smon pa'i 'bras bu 'grub pa dang / 
<p>83b.2</p>gdul bya yongs su smin par byed pa dang / gdul bya 'dun par byed pa'i chos ston pa dang / mthu thogs pa med pas gzhan gyi don sgrub pa dang / bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs mang po'i mdzod lta bu dang / 'phags pa thams cad gshegs shing rjes su gshegs pa dang / 
<p>83b.3</p>'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa gang du yang mi ltung bas bde blag tu 'gro ba dang / thos pa dang ma thos pa'i chos 'dzin pas mi zad pa dang / thar pa 'dod pa'i gdul bya la snyan par sgrogs pa dang / gzhan gyi don bya ba tha mi dad pa dang / dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa la
<p>83b.4</p>sogs pa kun du ston par rung ba nyid kyis grangs bzhin no/ /de ltar na/ de yang sa gser zla ba me/ /zhes bya ba la sogs pas sems bskyed pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis bshad pa yin no/ /de la dang po gsum ni chung ngu dang 'bring dang chen po nyid kyis las dang po pa'i sas bsdus so/ /
<p>83b.5</p>de'i 'og tu gcig ni sa dang po la 'jug pa'i lam gyis bsdus so/ /de'i 'og tu bcu ni rab tu dga' ba la sogs pa sa bcus bsdus te/ mthong ba dang bsgom pa'i lam gyi spyod yul can yin no/ /de'i 'og tu lnga ni khyad par gyi lam gyis bsdus so/ /de'i 'og tu sems
<p>83b.6</p>bskyed pa gsum ni sbyor ba dang dngos dang mjug gi sgo nas sangs rgyas kyi sas bsdus te/ de ltar na sems bskyed pa'i rab tu dbye ba ni las dang po pa'i sa nas bzung ste sangs rgyas kyi sa'i bar gyis bsdus pa yin no/ /dbye ba zhar la brjod nas de ltar byang chub kyi sems dang po la sogs pa
<p>83b.7</p>bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dus ji lta ba bzhin du don du gnyer bar byed pa'i byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa dang / des 'phangs pa'i chos 'grub par bya ba'i phyir yon tan thob pa yongs su bsrung ba'i don gyis mngon par 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir 'doms pa ni gdams ngag ste/ sgrub
<p>84a</p>
<p>84a.1</p>dang bden pa rnams dang ni/ /sangs rgyas la sogs dkon mchog gsum/ /ma zhen yongs su mi ngal dang / /lam ni yongs su 'dzin pa dang / /spyan lnga dang ni mngon shes kyi/ /yon tan drug dang mthong lam dang / /bsgom zhes bya la gdams
<p>84a.2</p>ngag ni/ /bcu yi bdag nyid shes par bya/ /zhes gsungs pa yin no/ /byang chub kyi sems kyi rab tu dbye ba ji skad bshad pa bsgrub pa la/ kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i bden pa las mi 'da' bas nyan thos la sogs pa dang thun mong ma yin pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'jug
<p>84a.3</p>par bya'o zhes slob pa sgrub pa la 'doms pa dang / sdug bsngal la gzugs la sogs pa 'bras bur gyur pa'i stong pa nyid dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dag de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bor rang bzhin gcig go zhes bya ba dang / kun 'byung ba la stong pa nyid dang gzugs la sogs pa
<p>84a.4</p>rgyur gyur pa dag tha mi dad pa nyid kyis gzugs la sogs pa ni kun 'byung ba dang 'gog pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba'i chos can ma yin no zhes bya ba dang / 'gog pa la stong pa nyid skye ba dang / 'gag pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / 
<p>84a.5</p>nyams pa dang 'phel ba la sogs pa dang bral ba la ni gzugs med pa nas ma rig pa skye ba yang med/ ma rig pa 'gag pa yang med/ sangs rgyas kyang med/ byang chub kyi bar du yang med do zhes bya ba dang / lam la sbyin pa la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bdag nyid
<p>84a.6</p>dam nang stong pa nyid la sogs pa ni phyi stong pa nyid la sogs sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' dag phan tshun ldan pa dang mi ldan pa ma yin pa nyid du sgrub bo zhes ston pa bden pa la 'doms pa dang / sangs rgyas la sogs sangs rgyas dang byang chub dag mtshan nyid kyis sangs rgyas su byed pa'i
<p>84a.7</p>chos kyi mtshan nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi dmigs pa la gzugs la sogs pa mi sbyor bas dmigs par bya ba dang dmigs par byed pa nyid du shes pa zhes bya ba dang / chos la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gsum gyis bsdus pa'i gzhi dang / gnyen po dang / rnam pa
<p>84b</p>
<p>84b.1</p>mtha' dag bsdus pa dag gis bsdus pa'i chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med do zhes bya ba dang / dge 'dun la sangs rgyas dkon mchog gi khongs su gtogs pa nyid kyi dgra bcom pa ma gtogs pa 'bras bu la gnas pa dang zhugs pa'i bye brag gis skyes bu chen po bdun po rang sangs
<p>84b.2</p>rgyas dang lhan cig brgyad po dbang po rtul po la sogs pa'i bye brag gis grangs nyi shur chad pa byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa slob pa phyir mi ldog pa rnams la skye ba med pa nyid du 'jug par bya'o zhes lung 'bogs pa dkon mchog gsum la 'doms pa dang / brtson 'grus brtsams pa
<p>84b.3</p>nyid kyis ji skad bshad pa'i don la nan tan byed pa la/ lus la sogs pa'i bsod nams nyid kyis la la mngon par zhen par 'gyur bas ma zhen pa la lus la sogs pa ngo bo nyid med par bstan pa'i 'doms pa dang / dus yun ring po zhig tu goms par byas kyang 'dod pa'i don ma
<p>84b.4</p>grub na dngang ba'i rang bzhin can yongs su skyo bar 'gyur bas yongs su ngal ba med pa la gzugs la sogs pa nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar la rlom pa med pa nyid du bstan pa'i gdams ngag dang / phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas la sogs pa las don re
<p>84b.5</p>re'i phyir lam gyi lung nod par bya na sems zhum par 'gyur bas lam yongs su gzung ba la chos rnams rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa nyid du bslab pa'i gdams ngag dang / sha'i dang / rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i lha'i dang / shes rab dang chos dang sangs rgyas kyi spyan grangs ji lta ba
<p>84b.6</p>bzhin du dngos po so sor nges pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye ba dang / chos thams cad la rnam par mi rtog pa dang / 'phags pa'i gang zag thams cad rtogs pa dang / chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i yul
<p>84b.7</p>can rnams de bzhin nyid du gcig pa nyid du bsgrub bo zhes slob pa spyan lnga la 'doms pa dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / lha'i rna ba dang / gzhan gyi sems shes pa dang / sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa las byung ba lha'i mig dang / zag pa zad pa shes
<p>85a</p>
<p>85a.1</p>pa'i mngon par shes pa sa g.yo ba la sogs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na gnas pa'i sgra chung ngu dang cig shos thos pa dang / gzhan gyi sems 'dod chags dang bcas pa la sogs pa yongs su shes pa dang / rang dang gzhan gyi tshe
<p>85a.2</p>rabs snga ma du ma rjes su dran pa dang / gzugs thams cad mthong ba dang / nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa spong bar byed pa rnams gzod ma nas zhi ba nyid du rtogs par bya'o zhes ston pa mngon par shes pa drug la 'doms pa dang / mthong ba'i lam bden pa bzhis
<p>85a.3</p>bsdus pa skad cig ma bcu drug gi ngo bo nyid chos dang rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa dang / shes pa'i bdag nyid la/ rnal 'byor pa chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med par rtogs pas sgyu ma mkhan bzhin du thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med pa'i lus can des spang bar bya ba'i dngos po'i
<p>85a.4</p>gnyen po nyid du rnam par sgom par byed do zhes ston pa mthong ba'i lam la 'doms pa dang / 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas dag ngo bo gcig pa nyid kyis phan tshun tha dad par gdags par mi nus pa bzhin du/ ji skad bshad pa'i mthong ba'i lam gyis mngon sum du byas pa'i
<p>85a.5</p>dngos po las tha mi dad pa la dmigs pa'i phyir mthong ba dang bsgom pa dag tha dad du gyur pa med pas bsgom pa'i lam mtshan nyid pa rnam par bzhag pa ni med kyi/ 'on kyang de ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i chos nyid kyis des spang bar bya ba'i dngos po'i gnyen po nyid du rnam par
<p>85a.6</p>sgom par byed do zhes bsgom pa'i lam la 'doms pa ste/ de ltar na byang chub kyi sems dang / des 'phangs pa'i chos kyi ngo bo nyid kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgrub pa'i rnam pa gang yin pa mi dmigs pa dang / de'i dmigs pa gang yin pa 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi
<p>85a.7</p>dang / rten gang yin pa skyabs gsum dang khyad par du 'gro ba'i rgyu gang yin pa ma chags pa dang / mi ldog par 'gro ba'i rgyu gang yin pa yongs su mi ngal ba dang / theg pa gzhan gyis mi 'gro ba'i rgyu gang yin pa lam yongs su 'dzin pa dang / gzhan gyis dring mi 'jog par 'gro
<p>85b</p>
<p>85b.1</p>ba nyid kyi rgyu gang yin pa spyan lnga dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyu gang yin pa mngon par shes pa drug dang / mthar thug pa'i rgyu gang yin pa mthong ba dang bsgom pa'i lam dag ste/ de dag thams cad gdams ngag gi skabs su bstan te/ 'di tsam
<p>85b.2</p>kho nas don thams cad phun sum tshogs par 'gyur bas gdams ngag ni rnam pa bcu'o/ /dge 'dun dkon mchog gi skabs su bde blag tu rtogs par bya ba'i phyir bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa gnyis po/ dbang po rtul dang rnon po dag /dad dang mthong thob rigs nas rigs/ /
<p>85b.3</p>bar chad gcig par skyes nas dang / /byed dang byed min 'og min 'gro/ /'phar gsum srid rtse'i mthar thug 'gro/ /gzugs kyi chags bcom mthong ba yi/ /chos la zhi lus mngon sum byed/ /bse ru dang ni nyi shu'o/ /zhes bya ba gsungs so/ /'chad par 'gyur
<p>85b.4</p>ba'i lam shes pa nyid kyis bsdus pa mthong ba'i lam skad cig bcu drug la brten nas dad pa dang chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i bye brag gis 'bras bu dang po la zhugs pa rnam pa gnyis so/ /de'i 'og tu rgyun tu zhugs pa yin no/ /de'i 'og tu de nyid lha dang mi'i rigs nas rigs su
<p>85b.5</p>skye ba nyid kyis gzhan rnam pa gnyis yin no/ /de'i 'og tu dbang po rtul po dang rnon po dad pa dang mthong bas thob pa dag 'bras bu gnyis pa la zhugs pa gcig kho na yin no/ /de'i 'og tu lan cig phyir 'ong ba yin no/ /de'i 'og tu de nyid gzhan bar chad gcig pa yin no/ /
<p>85b.6</p>de'i 'og tu snga ma bzhin du dad pa dang mthong bas thob pa 'bras bu gsum pa la zhugs pa yin no/ /de'i 'og tu phyir mi 'ong ba ste/ bar ma do dang / skyes nas dang / mngon par 'du byed pa dang bcas pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa med par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba 
<p>85b.7</p>zhes bya ba rnam pa bzhi'o/ /de'i 'og tu de nyid 'og min gyi mthar thug par 'gro ba ste/ 'phar ba dang phyed du 'phar ba dang / gnas thams cad du 'pho ba nyid kyis gong du 'pho ba gzhan rnam pa gsum mo/ /de'i 'og tu de nyid srid pa'i rtse mo'i mthar thug par 'gro ba ni gzugs
<p>86a</p>
<p>86a.1</p>kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba ste/ mthong ba'i chos la zhi ba dang lus kyis mngon sum du byed pa gzhan rnam pa gnyis so/ /de'i 'og tu dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu la zhugs pa yin no/ /de'i 'og tu rang sangs rgyas te nyi shu'o/ /las dang po pa
<p>86a.2</p>de ltar gdams ngag thob pa la nges par 'byed pa'i yan lag 'byung bas nges par 'byed pa'i yan lag /dmigs pa dang ni rnam pa dang / /rgyu dang yongs su 'dzin pa dang / /byang chub sems dpa' skyob pa yi/ /drod sogs bdag nyid ji bzhin du/ /rnam rtog bzhi
<p>86a.3</p>po ldan bsten pa/ /chung dang 'bring dang chen po rnams/ /nyan thos bse ru lta bu dang / /bcas pa dag las khyad par 'phags/ /zhes bya ba gsungs te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thos pa la sogs pa rab kyi mthar phyin pa thob pa thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa dad pa la sogs
<p>86a.4</p>pa'i mtshan nyid kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i 'og tu bden pa bzhi rtogs pa dang rjes su mthun pa nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa bzhi po 'jig rten pa'i bsgoms pa las byung ba dro bar gyur pa zhes bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / de'i 'og tu rtse mor gyur pa dang / de'i 'og tu bzod par gyur pa dang / de'i
<p>86a.5</p>'og tu chos kyi mchog ces bya ba chung ngu la sogs pa'i rim gyis skye bas sam/ byang chub sems dpa' dang 'brel pa'i dbang po rtul po la sogs pa gang zag gi bye brag gis chung ngu dang 'bring dang chen po 'chad par 'gyur ba dmigs pa'i khyad par gyi ngo bo nyid bden pa bzhi'i dngos po la
<p>86a.6</p>dmigs pa dang / chos su lta ba'i gnyen po nyid kyis mngon par zhen pa med pa la sogs pa'i rnam par zhugs pa dang / theg pa gsum car rtogs pa'i rgyu'i ngo bo dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen thabs la mkhas pa'i mtshan nyid kyis yongs su 'dzin pa dang ldan pa dang / mthong ba
<p>86a.7</p>dang bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnam pa bzhi po 'chad par 'gyur ba'i tshul dang 'brel bar 'byung ba ni nyan thos la sogs pa'i dro ba la sogs pa las khyad par du 'phags pa yin no/ /de dag gi dro bar gyur pa la sogs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ni/ lugs
<p>86b</p>
<p>86b.1</p>las gzugs su rung ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi dngos po'i bdag nyid kyi bden pa bzhi la dmigs pa dang / bdag tu lta ba'i gnyen po nyid kyis mi rtag pa la sogs pa'i rnam par zhugs pa dang / rang gi theg pa rtogs pa kho na'i ched du dang / yongs su 'dzin pa dang
<p>86b.2</p>bral ba dang / rnam par rtog pa rnam pa bzhi dang mi ldan par 'byung ngo zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa rnams ni/ thabs mkhas pa'i stobs kyis kha cig tu ni rgyu'i sgo nas/ kha cig tu ni 'bras bu'i sgo nas/ kha cig tu ni
<p>86b.3</p>ngo bo nyid kyi sgo nas/ kha cig tu ni chos nyid kyi rnam pa'i sgo nas/ ji ltar srid pa bzhin bden pa bzhi'i dngos po la dmigs pa yin la/ snga ma bzhin du rnam pa gzhan gyis kyang bden pa bzhi la kun du dmigs so zhes bya bar shes par bya'o/ /mdor bsdus te rnam par bkrol ba
<p>86b.4</p>tsam du brjod par 'dod pas ma spros so/ /gang gi phyir 'di ni rnam par gzhag pa gzhan kho na yin te/ de'i phyir theg pa gzhan la brten nas ni gang du yang sun 'byin pa brjod par mi bya'o/ /dmigs pa dang rnam pa'i khyad par ji lta bu yin zhe na/ de'i phyir dmigs pa dang rnam pa
<p>86b.5</p>dag bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa bdun gyis bshad de/ dmigs pa mi rtag la sogs pa/ /bden pa'i rten can de yi ni/ /rnam pa mngon zhen la sogs 'gog /theg pa gsum car 'thob pa'i rgyu/ /gzugs sogs 'du 'god gnas bral dang / /gnas dang
<p>86b.6</p>btags dang brjod du med/ /ces bya'o/ /de la chung ngu'i dmigs pa ni sdug bsngal la sogs pa'i bden pa bzhi po la rten pa mi rtag pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa bcu drug yin no/ /de'i rnam pa ni sdug bsngal la sogs pa'i bden pa la mngon par zhen pa dang dmigs pa la sogs
<p>86b.7</p>pa 'gog pa yin no/ /dro ba la sogs pa thams cad kyang theg pa gsum car rtogs pa 'thob pa'i rgyu'i ngo bo yin par khong du chud par bya'o/ /'bring gi dmigs pa ni mos pa dang de kho na nyid yid la byed pa dag gis grangs bzhin du gzugs la sogs pa bsgrub pa dang / dgag
<p>87a</p>
<p>87a.1</p>pa dag mi dmigs shing ma mthong ba zhes bya ba yin no/ /rnam pa ni ming thams cad med pa nyid kyis rgyun mi 'dra ba dang rgyun 'dra bar 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid dag med pa zhes bya ba yin no/ /chen po'i dmigs pa ni gzugs nas sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i bar
<p>87a.2</p>chos thams cad brdar btags pa'i chos tha snyad pa yin no zhes bya ba yin no/ /rnam pa ni dge ba la sogs pa nyid kyi chos gang du yang brjod du med pa zhes bya ba yin te/ de ltar na rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyi me'i snga ltas yin pa'i phyir dro bar gyur pa dmigs pa dang rnam pa
<p>87a.3</p>dang ldan pa rnam pa gsum mo/ /gzugs sogs mi gnas de dag ni/ /de yi ngo bor rang bzhin med/ /de dag gcig gi rang bzhin gcig /de mi rtag sogs par mi gnas/ /de rnams de yi ngo bos stong / /de dag gcig gi rang bzhin gcig /chos rnams mi 'dzin
<p>87a.4</p>gang yin dang / /de dag mtshan mar mi mthong phyir/ /shes rab kyis ni yongs rtog pa/ /thams cad dmigs su med par ro/ /zhes bya ba la/ chung ngu'i dmigs pa ni gzugs la sogs pa ni gzugs la sogs pa rang gi ngo bo dang bral ba'i ngo bo nyid yin pas/ rang gi
<p>87a.5</p>ngo bo stong pa nyid kyis gzugs la sogs pa la mi gnas pa zhes bya ba yin no/ /rnam pa ni don dam par gzugs la sogs pa'i chos thams cad dang / stong pa nyid dag phan tshun ngo bo gcig yin pas stong pa nyid la mi rtag pa la sogs pa med pa nyid kyis gzugs la sogs
<p>87a.6</p>pa de dag la rtag pa dang mi rtag pa la sogs pa nyid du mi gnas pa zhes bya ba yin no/ /'bring gi dmigs pa ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid kyis mi rtag pa la sogs pa dang stong pa nyid rnams ni rang gi ngo bo nyid med pa yin pas/ mi rtag pa nyid la sogs pa dang stong pa nyid dag
<p>87a.7</p>phan tshun bdag nyid gcig pa zhes bya ba yin no/ /rnam pa ni ngo bo nyid bkag pas gzugs la sogs pa la rang gir mi byed pa zhes bya ba gang yin pa de yin no/ /chen po'i dmigs pa ni ngo bo nyid med pa nyid kyis gzugs la sogs pa de dag la sngon po la sogs pa'i mtshan
<p>87b</p>
<p>87b.1</p>mar mi mthong ba zhes bya ba yin no/ /rnam pa ni shes rab kyis yang dag par chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pas dngos po thams cad mi dmigs par nges par rtog pa zhes bya ba yin no/ /de ltar na dge ba'i rtsa ba g.yo ba'i rtse mo yin pa'i phyir rtse mor gyur pa dmigs pa dang rnam pa dang
<p>87b.2</p>ldan pa rnam pa gsum mo/ /gzugs sogs ngo bo nyid med nyid/ /de med pa nyid ngo bo nyid/ /de dag skye med nges 'byung med/ /dag dang de dag mtshan ma med/ /de yi mtshan mar mi rten pas/ /mos min 'du shes med pa yin/ /ces bya ba la/ chung ngu'i dmigs
<p>87b.3</p>pa ni mtshan nyid kyi ngo bo nyid dang / ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid dag stong pa nyid du gcig pa nyid kyis gzugs la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid med pa nyid ces bya ba yin no/ /rnam pa ni skye bo dmigs pa can gyi ngor gzugs la sogs pa dngos po med pa nyid ngo bo nyid do zhes bya ba yin no/ /
<p>87b.4</p>'bring gi dmigs pa ni rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa nyid kyis gzugs la sogs pa la skye ba yang med mya ngan las 'das pa yang med ces bya ba yin no/ /rnam pa ni chos thams cad kyi rang gi ngo bo rtogs pa kho nas lus la sogs pa rnam pa thams cad du rnam par dag pa zhes
<p>87b.5</p>bya ba yin no/ /chen po'i dmigs pa ni rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid mi 'thad pas chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa nyid do zhes bya ba yin no/ /rnam pa ni rang bzhin kho nas gzugs la sogs pa'i mtshan ma rnams kyi rten dang bral ba nyid kyis mos pa yid la byed pas mi mos
<p>87b.6</p>shing de kho na nyid yid la byed pas yongs su shes pa med pa zhes bya ba yin te/ de ltar na ngan 'gro med pas chos chen po la bzod pa'i phyir bzod par gyur pa dmigs pa dang rnam pa dang ldan pa rnam pa gsum mo/ /ting 'dzin de yi byed pa nyid/ /lung ston pa dang rlom pa
<p>87b.7</p>zad/ /gsum po phan tshun ngo bo gcig /ting 'dzin rnam par mi rtog pa/ /de ltar nges 'byed cha mthun ni/ /chung dang 'bring dang chen po yin/ /zhes bya ba la chung ngu'i dmigs pa ni chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang dpa' bar 'gro ba la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom
<p>88a</p>
<p>88a.1</p>par bya'o zhes bya ba yin no/ /rnam pa ni rang gi smon lam dang bsod nams dang ye shes dang chos kyi dbyings kyi stobs kyis lhun gyis grub par 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du ting nge 'dzin gyi byed pa 'jug pa zhes bya ba yin
<p>88a.2</p>no/ /'bring gi dmigs pa ni yang dag par zhugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pa la sangs rgyas rnams lung ston par mdzad pa 'di ni chos nyid do zhes bya ba yin no/ /rnam pa ni rnam par rtog pa thams cad mi 'thad pas byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin gyi rang gi
<p>88a.3</p>ngo bo rtogs pa la bdag ni mnyam par bzhag pa'o snyam pa la sogs pa'i shes pa mi 'byung ba zhes bya ba yin no/ /chen po'i dmigs pa ni chos nyid kyis ting nge 'dzin dang byang chub sems dpa' dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang don gsum phan tshun ngo bo gcig pa'o zhes bya
<p>88a.4</p>ba yin no/ /rnam pa ni chos thams cad yod pa ma yin pa nyid kyis ting nge 'dzin du rnam par mi rtog pa ni thabs dam pa'o zhes bya ba yin te/ de ltar na 'jig rten pa'i chos thams cad kyi mchog yin pa'i phyir chos kyi mchog ces bya ba dmigs pa dang rnam pa dang ldan pa rnam pa
<p>88a.5</p>gsum mo/ /dmigs pa mi rtag la sogs pa/ /bden pa'i rten can/ zhes bya ba ma gtogs par/ dmigs pa dang rnam pa khyad par can gyi chos can dang chos brjod pas brjod par bya ba yin yang dmigs pa dang rnam pa khyad par can gyi chos brjod pas thams cad du brjod
<p>88a.6</p>pa ni/ khyad par gzhan spong ba dang mi spong ba ma gtogs par 'di dag la don gyi khyad par ni 'ga' yang med do zhes lugs las 'byung ba'i phyir ro/ /rnam pa gcig tu na tshig le'ur byas pa bsdeb pa'i ngor tha dad par brjod kyang / mngon par zhen pa la sogs pa bkag pa dang
<p>88a.7</p>ldan pa dag de kho nar sgrub pa dang dgag pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba'i phyir sdug bsngal la sogs pa'i bden par gtogs pa kho na dmigs pa dang rnam par bya ba yin te 'og ma dag la yang de bzhin du shes par bya'o/ /rnam par rtog pa bzhi dang ldan pa yang don gsal bar bya ba'i phyir bar
<p>88b</p>
<p>88b.1</p>skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa/ gzhi dang de yi gnyen po yis/ /gzung bar rtog pa rnam pa gnyis/ /rmongs dang phung sogs bye brag gis/ /de ni so sor rnam pa dgu/ /zhes bya ba gsungs te/ gzung bar rnam par rtog pa kun nas nyon mongs pa'i gzhi'i rten can dang
<p>88b.2</p>gnyen po'i rten can nyid kyis rnam pa gnyis la ma rig pa dang rnam par byang ba'i phung po la sogs pa'i rab tu dbye bas rnam pa dgu'o/ /rdzas dang btags pa'i rten can gyis/ /'dzin pa'ang rnam pa gnyis su 'dod/ /rang dbang bdag sogs ngo bo dang / /phung sogs rten las de
<p>88b.3</p>bzhin no/ /zhes bya ba ni/ gang zag rdzas su yod pa dang / skyes bu btags par yod pa la dmigs pas 'dzin par rnam par rtog pa yang rnam pa gnyis yin la/ bdag rang dbang can dang / phung po la sogs pa la dmigs pa nyid kyis so sor de ltar rnam pa dgu'o/ /de la
<p>88b.4</p>mdor bsdus pa'i don ni 'di yin te/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i gzhi'i rten can/ ma rig pa dang / gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po dang / ming dang gzugs la mngon par zhen pa dang / mtha' gnyis la chags pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba mi shes pa
<p>88b.5</p>dang / 'phags pa'i lam la mi gnas pa dang / dmigs pa dang / bdag la sogs pa dang / rnam par dag pa skyed pa la sogs pa la gzung bar rnam par rtog pa rnams dang / gnyen po'i rten can/ phung po dang / skye ba'i sgo dang / rigs dang / skye ba dang / stong pa nyid dang / 
<p>88b.6</p>pha rol tu phyin pa'i don dang / mthong ba dang / bsgom pa dang / mi slob pa'i lam la gzung bar rnam par rtog pa rnams dang / gang zag rdzas su yod pa'i rten can bdag /rang dbang can dang / gcig pu dang / rgyu dang / lta ba po la sogs pa'i bdag dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa
<p>88b.7</p>dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / mthong ba dang / bsgom pa dang / don byas pa'i rten la 'dzin par rnam par rtog pa rnams dang / skyes bu btags par yod pa'i rten can phung po dang skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / rnam par byang ba dang / 
<p>89a</p>
<p>89a.1</p>mthong ba dang / bsgom pa dang / khyad par dang / mi slob pa'i lam la 'dzin par rnam par rtog pa rnams te/ de lta bu'i rnam par rtog pa bzhi dang nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa bzhi po grangs bzhin du ldan pa yin no/ /tshigs su bcad pa sbyar ba
<p>89a.2</p>dang mthun par yongs su 'dzin pa sngar gsungs na yang de'i stobs kyis ji skad bshad pa khyad par du 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa'i phyir yang mjug thogs su bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa/ sems mi 'gong ba nyid la sogs/ /ngo bo nyid med sogs ston byed/ /de yi mi mthun
<p>89a.3</p>phyogs bor ba/ /rnam pa kun du yongs 'dzin yin/ /zhes bya ba gsungs te/ sems mi 'gong zhing mi skrag pa la sogs pa'i thabs mkhas pas bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du dngos po mtha' dag bdag med pa la sogs par ston par byed pa/ mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi chos
<p>89a.4</p>ser sna la sogs pa dang mi ldan pa ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin pas yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/ /sgrub pa dang ldan pa la nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa ji skad bshad pa dang / mthong ba'i lam la sogs pa gzhan yang 'byung bas sgrub pa'i rten du gyur pa/ rtogs pa
<p>89a.5</p>yi ni chos drug dang / /gnyen po dang ni spong ba dang / /de dag yongs su gtugs pa dang / /shes rab snying brtser bcas pa dang / /slob ma thun mong min nyid dang / /gzhan gyi don gyi go rims dang / /ye shes rtsol ba mi mnga' bar/ /'jug pa'i rten la rigs shes 
<p>89a.6</p>bya/ /zhes bya ba gsungs so/ /re zhig dang por 'jig rten pa'i nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa rnams so/ /de'i 'og tu 'jig rten las 'das pa mthong ba'i lam dang bsgom pa'i lam dag go/ /de'i 'og tu de dag skyes pa'i stobs kyis rkun po phyung ba dang sgo 'phar
<p>89a.7</p>bcad pa ltar dus mnyam du gnyen po dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs skye ba dang 'gag pa dag go/ /de'i 'og tu de dag mi dmigs pas de dag skye ba dang 'gag pa dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa spangs pa'o/ /de'i 'og tu sngon gyi smon lam dang sbyin pa la sogs pa thabs la mkhas
<p>89b</p>
<p>89b.1</p>pa'i stobs kyis 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa la mi gnas pa'i mtshan nyid kyi shes rab dang thabs so/ /de'i 'og tu de dag skyes pas nyan thos la sogs pa dang thun mong ma yin pa'i chos so/ /de'i 'og tu bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du gzhug pa la sogs pa la ldem por
<p>89b.2</p>dgongs pa'i sgo nas theg pa gsum gyi lam la dgod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi gzhan gyi don gyi go rims so/ /de'i 'og tu 'khor ba ji srid par mtshan ma med cing lhun gyis grub par gzhan gyi don gyi ye shes 'byung ba'i phyir te/ 'di ni go rims yin no/ /'dis kyang skyes
<p>89b.3</p>bu'i don thams cad phun sum tshogs pa yin no/ /sgrub pa'i chos kyi gnas skabs tha dad pa'i bye brag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa bcu gsum po ji skad du bshad pa'i chos kyi gzhir gyur pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid kho na la rigs zhes bstan to/ /gal te
<p>89b.4</p>chos kyi dbyings kho na 'phags pa'i chos rtogs par 'gyur ba'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir de'i bdag nyid can gyi byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi rang bzhin du gnas pa'i rigs yin na / 'o na ni de'i tshe de ni spyir gnas pa yin pa'i phyir byang chub sems
<p>89b.5</p>dpa' kho na ma yin no snyam pa'i skye bo blo dman pa'i ngor dogs pa bsu nas bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa/ chos kyi dbyings la dbyer med phyir/ /rigs ni tha dad rung ma yin/ /zhes bya ba gsungs so/ /ji ltar nyan thos kyi theg pa la sogs pa rtogs pa'i
<p>89b.6</p>rim gyis dmigs pa de bzhin du/ 'phags pa'i chos rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ chos kyi dbyings rgyu'i ngo bor rnam par 'jog pa'i sgo nas rigs nyid du tha snyad 'dogs so/ /zhes bya ba'i lan zhig kyang gzigs mod kyi/ sla chos nyid du 'jig rten pa'i dngags kyis lan gzhan du/ 
<p>89b.7</p>rten pa'i chos kyi bye brag gis/ /de yi dbye ba yongs su brjod/ /ces bya ba gsungs te/ dper na 'jim pa gcig las mngon par grub cing me lce gcig gis so btang ba'i rten bum pa la sogs pa/ brten pa sbrang rtsi dang li kha ra la sogs pa'i snod nyid kyis tha dad pa de bzhin du/ rten 
<p>90a</p>
<p>90a.1</p>pa'i chos theg pa gsum gyis bsdus pa/ rtogs par bya ba tha dad pa nyid kyis rten tha dad pa nyid do zhes bstan to/ /ji skad bshad pa'i sgrub pa'i rten gyi dmigs pa gang yin zhe na/ dmigs pa/ dmigs pa chos rnams thams cad de/ /de yang
<p>90a.2</p>dge la sogs pa yin/ /'jig rten pa yi rtogs pa dang / /gang dag 'jig rten 'das 'dod dang / /zag bcas zag pa med chos dang / /gang dag 'dus byas 'dus ma byas/ /slob ma thun mong chos rnams dang / /gang dag thub pa'i thun mong min/ /zhes bya ba
<p>90a.3</p>gsungs te/ re zhig dang por spyir dge ba dang mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa ste go rims bzhin du dge sbyong gi tshul nyid dang srog gcod pa la sogs pa dang lung du ma bstan pa'i lus kyi las la sogs pa'o/ /de'i 'og tu de dag nyid la 'jig rten pa la sogs pa rnam pa gnyis
<p>90a.4</p>po'i dbye ba bzhi nyid kyis lhag ma rnams te grangs bzhin du byis pa'i skye bo thams cad dang 'brel ba'i phung po lnga dang / 'phags pa'i skye bo thams cad kyis bsdus pa'i bsam gtan bzhi dang / bdag tu lta ba'i gnyen po ma yin pa'i nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga dang / der lta ba'i
<p>90a.5</p>gnyen po dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / rgyu dang rkyen la rag las pa 'dod pa'i khams la sogs pa dang / rgyu la mi ltos pa de bzhin nyid dang / 'phags pa'i skye bo thams cad kyi rgyud la 'byung ba'i bsam gtan bzhi dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
<p>90a.6</p>rgyud la 'byung ba'i chos can stobs bcu ste/ de lta bu la sogs pa chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa'i rim gyis dmigs pas na/ dmigs pa rnam pa bcu gcig go/ /dmigs pa de lta bu la sgrub pa'i ched du bya ba gang yin zhe na/ ched du bya ba/ sems can
<p>90a.7</p>kun mchog nyid sems dang / /spong dang rtogs dang gsum po la/ /chen po gsum gyi rang 'byung gi/ /ched du bya ba 'di shes bya/ /zhes bya ba gsungs so/ /rnam pa thams cad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su shes pa'i sgo nas 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i
<p>90b</p>
<p>90b.1</p>sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams nyid kyi/ sems can thams cad sems can kun gyi mchog nyid kyi sems chen po nyid dang / spong ba chen po nyid dang / rtogs pa chen po nyid kyi dbang du byas te/ de ltar sgrub pa la 'jug pa de'i phyir chen po nyid gsum dang ldan
<p>90b.2</p>pas tshad du bya ba gsum du shes par bya'o/ /de ltar sgrub pa'i rten du gyur pa la sogs pa brjod nas/ de'i rang gi ngo bo gang yin zhe na/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gsum gyi yul la spyir dge ba'i chos kyi rten can dang rnam pa kun mngon par rdzogs par rtogs pa la sogs
<p>90b.3</p>pa mngon par rtogs pa rnam pa bzhi la/ mngon par rtogs pa re re zhing pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi rten can gyi bya ba ni sgrub pa ste/ de ltar ji lta ba bzhin du sbyor ba dang mthong ba dang bsgom pa dang khyad par gyi lam gyi ngo bo nyid kyi sgrub pa'i mtshan nyid go cha dang 'jug pa dang tshogs dang nges
<p>90b.4</p>par 'byung ba rnams kyi nang nas brtson 'grus kyi ngo bo nyid kyis dang po go cha'i sgrub pa gsungs pa/ de dag so sor sbyin la sogs/ /rnam pa drug tu bsdus pa yis/ /go cha'i sgrub pa gang yin de / /drug tshan drug gis ji bzhin bshad/ /ces bya ba yin te/ chos kyi sbyin
<p>90b.5</p>pa la sogs pa sbyin par byed pa na/ nyan thos kyi yid la byed pa la sogs spong ba dang / skye bo thams cad kyis mi snyan par smra ba nyid bzod pa dang / 'dun pa skyed pa dang / theg pa gzhan dang ma 'dres pa'i rtse gcig pa nyid dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
<p>90b.6</p>chub tu bsngo ba rnams/ go rims bzhin du sbyin par bya ba la sogs pa mi dmigs pa'i go cha nyid kyis byed pa dang / de bzhin du tshul khrims srung bar byed/ bzod pa rdzogs par byed/ brtson 'grus rtsom/ bsam gtan sgrub/ shes rab sgom par byed do/ /de ltar sbyin
<p>90b.7</p>pa la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa so sor sbyin pa la sogs pa bsdus pas na drug tshan drug gis/ rnam pa sum cu rtsa drug yin mod kyi sbyin pa la sogs pa drug chos mthun pa'i phyir go cha'i sgrub pa rnam pa drug go/ //bam po gnyis pa/ de ltar go bgos pa la
<p>91a</p>
<p>91a.1</p>'jug pa 'byung bas gnyis pa 'jug pa'i sgrub pa/ bsam gtan gzugs med sbyin sogs dang / /lam dang byams la sogs pa dang / /dmigs pa med dang ldan pa dang / /'khor gsum rnam par dag pa dang / /ched du bya dang mngon shes drug /
<p>91a.2</p>rnam kun mkhyen pa'i tshul la ni/ /'jug pa'i sgrub pa theg chen la/ /'dzeg pa yin par shes par bya/ /zhes bya ba gsungs te/ bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa'i snyom par 'jug pa dang / sbyin pa la sogs pa pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang / mthong ba dang / bsgom pa
<p>91a.3</p>dang / mi slob pa dang khyad par gyi lam dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / mi dmigs pa dang ldan pa dang / dngos po thams cad la 'khor gsum dag pa dang / ched du bya ba dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dag la yang dag par
<p>91a.4</p>gnas pa'i mtshan nyid ni/ theg pa chen po'i chos mtha' dag gnon pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pas 'jug pa'i sgrub pa rnam pa dgu'o/ /de ltar 'jug pa byas pa la tshogs skye bas gsum pa tshogs kyi sgrub pa/ brtse dang sbyin la sogs pa drug /zhi gnas lhag mthong bcas pa dang / /
<p>91a.5</p>zung du 'brel pa'i lam gang dang / /thabs la mkhas pa gang yin dang / /ye shes dang ni bsod nams dang / /lam dang gzungs dang sa bcu dang / /gnyen po'i tshogs kyi sgrub pa yi/ /rim pa yin par shes par bya/ /zhes bya ba gsungs te/ snying rje chen po dang / sbyin
<p>91a.6</p>pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong dang / zung du 'brel ba'i lam dang / thabs mkhas pa dang / ye shes dang / bsod nams dang / mthong ba la sogs pa'i lam
<p>91a.7</p>dang / tshig la sogs pa'i gzungs dang / sa dang gnyen po rnams mi dmigs pas kun rdzob kyi bden pa las mi 'da' bar theg pa chen po'i don mtha' dag sgrub pas snying rje la sogs pa 'di dag gis yang dag par 'grub pa'i ngo bos byang chub chen po 'dzin par byed pa'i phyir na snying rje
<p>91b</p>
<p>91b.1</p>chen po la sogs pa ni tshogs yin pas/ tshogs kyi sgrub pa rnam pa bcu bdun no/ /de la ye shes kyi tshogs ni/ nang dang / phyi dang / de gnyis ka dang / stong pa dang / chen po dang / don dam pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / mtha' las 'das pa dang / 
<p>91b.2</p>thog ma dang / tha ma med pa dang / dor ba med pa dang / rang bzhin dang / chos thams cad dang / rang gi mtshan nyid dang / mi dmigs pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / dngos po dang dngos po med pa dang / rang gi ngo bo dang / gzhan gyi ngo bo stong pa nyid kyi bye
<p>91b.3</p>brag gis rnam pa nyi shu'o/ /'dir smras pa/ nang dang phyi rol rnams dang ni/ /gnyis dang stong pa'i dngos po dang / /phyogs dang mya ngan 'das lam dang / /rkyen las skyes dang cig shos dang / /mtha' 'das thog ma dor ba med/ /rang bzhin dang ni chos kun dang / /
<p>91b.4</p>chos skye la sogs 'das sogs dang / /ldan dang cig shos ngo bo dang / /mkha' dang stong pa zhes bya dang / /chos kyi gzhan gyi ngo bo nyid/ /rang rang ngo bos stong pa'i phyir/ /stong pa nyid ni nyi shur 'dod/ /sa'i tshogs la sa gang gi yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ba'i chos
<p>91b.5</p>gang dag yin pa de dag bstan pa'i phyir bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa nyi shu rtsa gsum gsungs pa / yongs su sbyong ba rnam bcu yis/ /sa ni dang po 'thob 'gyur te/ /bsam dang phan pa'i dngos nyid dang / /sems can rnams la sems mnyam nyid/ /gtong dang bshes
<p>91b.6</p>gnyen sten pa dang / /dam chos dmigs pa tshol ba dang / /rtag tu nges 'byung sems nyid dang / /sangs rgyas skur 'dod dga' ba dang / /chos ston pa dang bden pa yi/ /tshig ni bcu pa yin par 'dod/ /'di dag rang bzhin mi dmigs pas/ /yongs su sbyong
<p>91b.7</p>bar shes par bya/ /zhes bya ba ni/ rim pa ji lta ba bzhin gzhi thams cad la gya gyu med pa'i bsam pa dang / rang dang gzhan gyi dgos pa la phan pa nyid dang / sems can thams cad la sems gcig pa nyid dang / bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang / dge ba'i
<p>92a</p>
<p>92a.1</p>bshes gnyen mgu bar byed pa dang / theg pa gsum du gtogs pa'i dam pa'i chos kyi dmigs pa 'dod pa dang / khyim na gnas pa la mngon par mi dga' ba dang / bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku 'dod pa dang / dam pa'i chos rab tu ston pa dang / 
<p>92a.2</p>bden par smra ba nyid ces bya ba de lta bu'i mtshan nyid kyi chos bcus rnam pa thams cad du bskyed par bya ba yin pa'i phyir/ yongs su sbyong ba'i rgyu'i khyad par ngo bo nyid mi dmigs pas khyad par du byas pa'i mtshan nyid kyi yongs su sbyong ba dag kho nas sa dang po rab tu dga' ba 'thob pa
<p>92a.3</p>yin no/ /tshul khrims byas pa gzo dang bzod/ /rab tu dga' dang snying brtse che/ /bkur sti bla ma la gus nyan/ /brgyad pa sbyin la sogs la brtson/ /zhes bya ba ni/ dge ba'i chos dang / sems can gyi don bya ba dang / sdom pa'i
<p>92a.4</p>tshul khrims dang / gzhan gyis phan pa byas pa dran pa dang / gzhan gyis gnod pa byas pa la sogs pa bzod pa dang / dge ba'i chos sgrub pa la 'gyod pa med pa dang / skye bo thams cad la byams pa dang / mkhan po la sogs pa la 'dud pa dang / dge
<p>92a.5</p>ba'i bshes gnyen gyis bstan pa'i chos sgrub pa dang / sbyin pa la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spro ba zhes bya ba de lta bu'i yongs su sbyong ba snga ma bzhin yongs su sbyang ba byas pa'i khyad par rnam pa brgyad kyis sa gnyis pa dri ma med pa 'thob pa yin no/ /thos pas mi
<p>92a.6</p>ngoms nyid dang ni/ /zang zing med par chos sbyin dang / /sangs rgyas zhing kun sbyong ba dang / /'khor bas yongs su mi skyo dang / /ngo tsha khrel yod ces bya ba/ /rlom med bdag nyid de rnam lnga/ zhes bya ba ni/ dam pa'i chos mnyan pas ngoms mi shes pa dang / 
<p>92a.7</p>rnyed pa la sogs pa la mi lta ba'i sems kyis dam pa'i chos rab tu ston pa dang / rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rten dang brten pa kun du sbyong ba dang / phan btags pa'i sems can mi mthun pa la sogs pa mthong bas yongs su mi skyo ba dang / rang dang gzhan la ltos nas mi
<p>92b</p>
<p>92b.1</p>dge ba'i chos mi byed pa zhes bya ba de lta bu'i yongs su sbyong ba rnam pa lnga po/ /snga ma bzhin du ngo bo nyid du mi rtog pas yongs su sbyang ba byas pas sa gsum pa 'od byed pa rtogs pa yin no/ /nags gnas 'dod chung chog shes dang / /sbyangs pa yang dag sdom bsten dang / /
<p>92b.2</p>bslab pa yongs su mi gtong dang / /'dod pa rnams la smod pa dang / /mya ngan 'das dang bdog kun gtong / /mi zhum pa dang lta ba med/ /ces bya ba ni/ dgon par gnas pa dang / rnyed pa ma thob pa la mngon par 'dod pa med pa dang / rnyed pa thob pa la lhag par
<p>92b.3</p>don du gnyer ba med pa dang / bsod snyoms pa nyid la sogs pa sbyangs pa'i yon tan yang dag par sdom pa dang / bslab pa blangs pa srog la sogs pa'i phyir yang yongs su mi gtong ba dang / 'dod pa'i yon tan la nyes dmigs su lta bas smod pa dang / gdul bya
<p>92b.4</p>dang 'tsham par mya ngan las 'das pa la gzhol bar byed pa dang / bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang / dge ba sgrub pa la sems mi zhum pa dang / dngos po thams cad la mi lta ba zhes bya ba de lta bu'i yongs su sbyong ba snga ma lta bu rnam pa bcus sa bzhi pa 'od 'phro
<p>92b.5</p>ba can gnon pa yin no/ /'dris dang khyim la 'khren pa dang / /'du 'dzir gyur pa'i gnas dang ni/ /bdag bstod gzhan la brnyas pa dang / /mi dge'i las kyi lam bcu dang / /rlom pas khengs dang phyin ci log /blo ngan dang ni nyon mongs bzod/ /bcu po
<p>92b.6</p>'di ni rnam spangs na/ /sa lnga pa ni yang dag 'thob/ /ces bya ba ni/ rnyed pa la sogs pa'i don du rab tu byung ba la sogs pa dang 'grogs pa dang / dad pa can gyi khyim nye bar mi ston pa dang / skye bo mang po'i grong la sogs pa dang / bdag la bsngags pa dang / 
<p>92b.7</p>gzhan la smod pa dang / mi dge ba'i las kyi lam bcu dang / thos pa la sogs pas rlom zhing gzhan la mi 'dud pa dang / dge ba dang mi dge ba la bzlog ste mngon par zhen pa dang / log par lta ba la sogs pa blo gros ngan pa dang / 'dod chags la sogs pa
<p>93a</p>
<p>93a.1</p>nyon mongs pa thams cad la phyogs par byed pa zhes bya ba de lta bu'i mtshan nyid kyi chos bcu rnam par spong zhing bzlog pa'i chos don gyis 'phangs pa yongs su sbyong ba rnam pa bcus snga ma bzhin du sa lnga pa sbyang dka' ba 'thob pa yin no/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod
<p>93a.2</p>brtson 'grus/ /bsam gtan shes rab rab rdzogs pas/ /slob ma dang ni bse ru la/ /dga' dang skrag pa'i sems spangs pa/ /bslangs na mi zhum bdog pa kun/ /btang yang mi dga' med pa dang / /dbul yang slong ba mi spong bas/ /sa ni drug pa yang dag 'thob/ /
<p>93a.3</p>ces bya ba ni/ /pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pas nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas la 'dod pa dang / ngo bo nyid mi dmigs pa la skrag pa dang / slong ba po'i skye bos bslangs na zhum pa dang / bdog pa thams cad rang gi ngang gis gtong bar zhugs pa la mi dga' ba dang / 
<p>93a.4</p>bkren yang slong ba'i skye bo spong ba'i sems spong ba ste/ de lta bu'i yongs su sbyong ba bcu gnyis kyis snga ma bzhin du sa drug pa mngon du gyur pa kun shes par 'gyur ba yin no/ /bdag dang sems can 'dzin pa dang / /srog dang gang zag chad rtag dang / /mtshan ma rgyu dang phung po
<p>93a.5</p>dang / khams dang skye mched dag dang ni/ /khams gsum po la gnas dang chags/ /sems ni kun du zhum pa dang / /dkon mchog gsum dang tshul khrims la/ /der lta ba yi mngon zhen dang / /stong pa nyid la rtsod pa dang / /de dang 'gal ba'i nyes pa ni/ /nyi shu gang
<p>93a.6</p>la rnam chad pa/ /de yis sa ni bdun pa 'thob/ /ces bya ba ni/ bdag dang / sems can dang / srog dang / gang zag dang / chad pa dang / rtag pa dang / mtshan ma dang / rgyu dang / phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / khams gsum pa la gnas pa dang / 
<p>93a.7</p>chags pa dang / sems kun du zhum pa dang / sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun dang / tshul khrims su lta ba'i mngon par zhen pa dang / stong pa nyid la rtsod pa dang / 'gal ba rjod pa 'dzin pa yongs su spangs pa ste/ nyes pa de lta bu nyi shu dang bral nas/ bzlog pa'i
<p>93b</p>
<p>93b.1</p>chos don gyis 'phangs pa yongs su sbyong ba rnam pa nyi shus snga ma bzhin du sa bdun pa ring du song ba kun shes par 'gyur ba yin no/ /don gyis 'phangs pa'i chos nyid bstan pa'i phyir/ rnam thar sgo gsum shes pa dang / /'khor gsum rnam par dag nyid dang / /snying rje dang ni
<p>93b.2</p>rlom med dang / /chos mnyam nyid dang tshul gcig shes/ /mi skye ba dang bzod shes dang / /chos rnams rnam pa gcig tu ston/ /rtog pa kun du 'joms pa dang / /'du shes lta dang nyon mongs spong / /zhi gnas nges par sems pa dang / /lhag mthong la ni mkhas pa
<p>93b.3</p>dang / /sems dul ba dang thams cad la/ /thogs pa med pa'i ye shes dang / /chags pa'i sa min gar 'dod par/ /zhing gzhan du ni mnyam 'gro dang / /kun du bdag gi ngo bo ni/ /ston pa nyid dang nyi shu'o/ /zhes bya ba gsungs te/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa
<p>93b.4</p>nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yang dag par shes pa dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la gsad par bya ba dang / gsod pa po dang / bsad pa mi dmigs pa la sogs pa dang / skye bo thams cad la dmigs pa'i snying brtse ba dang / dngos por dmigs
<p>93b.5</p>pa med pa dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa dang / theg pa chen po gcig tu rtogs pa dang / mi skye ba yongs su shes pa dang / chos zab mo la nges par rtogs pa'i bzod pa khong du chud pa dang / shes bya thams cad theg pa chen po'i thabs kyi sgo nas rab tu
<p>93b.6</p>ston pa dang / rtog pa thams cad gcod pa dang / mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i rtog pa med pa dang / 'jig tshogs la lta ba la sogs pa lnga 'dor ba dang / 'dod chags la sogs pa nyon mongs pa spong ba dang / zhi gnas sgom pa dang / shes rab dang thabs la mkhas par
<p>93b.7</p>byed pa dang / sems nye bar zhi ba dang / gzugs la sogs pa la thogs pa med pa'i ye shes dang / mngon par zhen pa'i gnas ma yin pa dang / ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du dus mnyam du sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'gro ba dang / gdul bya dang mthun par thams cad du bdag gi
<p>94a</p>
<p>94a.1</p>lus rab tu ston pa zhes bya ba yongs su sbyong ba rnam pa nyi shu po 'dis kyang snga ma bzhin du sa bdun pa rtogs par 'gyur ba yin no/ /sems can kun yid shes pa dang / /mngon par shes pas brtse ba dang / /sangs rgyas zhing bzang sgrub pa dang / /yongs
<p>94a.2</p>su brtag phyir sangs rgyas bsten/ /dbang po shes dang rgyal ba yi/ /zhing sbyong sgyu ma ltar gnas dang / /bsams bzhin srid pa len pa dang / /las ni rnam pa 'di brgyad bshad/ /ces bya ba ni/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa ji lta ba bzhin shes pa dang / 
<p>94a.3</p>'jig rten gyi khams su rdzu 'phrul gyi mngon par shes pas brtse ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rten gser la sogs pa'i ngo bor yongs su bsgyur ba dang / rnam pa thams cad du chos yongs su brtag pas sangs rgyas mnyes par byed pa dang / lha'i mig skyed pa dang / sangs
<p>94a.4</p>rgyas kyi zhing rten pa sems can yongs su sbyong ba dang / thams cad du sgyu ma lta bur gnas pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi don mthong nas blo sngon du btang ba'i skye ba yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba yongs su sbyong ba'i chos de lta bu rnam pa brgyad kyis snga ma bzhin du sa brgyad pa mi
<p>94a.5</p>g.yo ba nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba yin no/ /smon lam dag ni mtha' yas dang / /lha la sogs pa'i skad shes dang / /spobs pa chu bo lta bu dang / /mngal du 'jug pa mchog dang ni/ /rigs dang rus dang cho 'brang dang / /'khor dang skye ba dag dang ni/ /nges 'byung byang
<p>94a.6</p>chub shing rnams dang / /yon tan phun sum tshogs pa yin/ /zhes bya ba ni/ smon lam mtha' yas pa dang / lha la sogs pa sems can thams cad kyi skad shes pa dang / spobs pa chu bo ltar mi zad pa dang / skye bo thams cad kyis bsngags pa'i mngal du 'jug pa
<p>94a.7</p>dang / rgyal po la sogs par gnas pa dang / nyi ma la sogs pa las skyes pa dang / ma la sogs pa dang legs par 'brel pa'i gnyen dang / rang dbang ba'i 'khor dang / brgya byin la sogs pas mngon par bstod par skye ba dang / sangs rgyas la sogs pas bskul te nges
<p>94b</p>
<p>94b.1</p>par 'byung ba dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang 'dra ba'i shing a shwad tha la sogs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi ngo bor gyur pa'i yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya ba de lta bu'i phun sum tshogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi yongs su sbyong ba rnam pa bcu gnyis pos / snga ma
<p>94b.2</p>bzhin du yongs su sbyang ba byas pa'i khyad par dag gis sa dgu pa legs pa'i blo gros mngon du byed pa yin no/ /rgyu'i sa rnams kyi yongs su sbyong ba de ltar nges par bstan nas/ 'bras bu'i sa nyid du de dag ma bshad par sa thams cad bsdu ba'i sgo nas sa bcu pa'i mtshan nyid/ sa dgu
<p>94b.3</p>'das nas ye shes ni/ /gang gis sangs rgyas sar gnas pa/ /de ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa/ /bcu pa yin par shes par bya/ /zhes bya ba gsungs te/ nyan thos la sogs pa'i rigs dang / 'bras bu dang po la zhugs pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir
<p>94b.4</p>'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa nyid ces bya ba drug dang / tshul gsum rnam par bzhag par dgongs pas bsdus pa lhag ma zhugs pa gsum dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams go rims bzhin du/ rigs dang / brgyad pa dang / mthong ba dang / bsrabs
<p>94b.5</p>pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / byas pa rtogs pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa rnams dang / ji skad bshad pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnam pa dgu po gcig kho na ste/ de ltar sa dgu 'das nas sa bcu pa la ni byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas
<p>94b.6</p>kho nar brjod par bya'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni ma yin no/ /zhes 'byung ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi sa de la smon lam shes pa gang gis gnas pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu pa yin par shes par bya ba yin no/ /gnyen po'i tshogs la bar skabs kyi tshigs
<p>94b.7</p>su bcad pa/ mthong dang goms pa'i lam dag la/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa'i rnam rtog rnams/ /nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/ /gnyen po rnam pa brgyad ces bya/ /zhes bya ba gsungs te/ gzung ba'i rnam par rtog pa kun nas nyon mongs pa'i dngos po tsam dang gnyen po'i
<p>95a</p>
<p>95a.1</p>rten can gnyis dang / 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa gang zag rdzas su yod pa dang skyes bu btags pa'i rten can gnyis so sor mthong ba'i lam dang bsgom pa'i lam la spong bas/ bzung ba dang 'dzin par rnam par rtog pa brgyad nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/ 
<p>95a.2</p>bden pa gnyis ka'i rnam pa la brten nas mngon du bya ba'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi rab tu dbye bas lam gnyis po kho na'i gnas skabs kyi khyad par gnyen po rnam pa brgyad do/ /de ltar tshogs bsags pa la nges par 'byung bas bzhi pa nges par 'byung ba'i sgrub pa/ ched du bya dang
<p>95a.3</p>mnyam nyid dang / /sems can don dang 'bad med dang / /mtha' las 'das par nges 'byung dang / /thob pa'i mtshan nyid nges 'byung dang / /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen nyid dang / /lam gyi yul can nges 'byung ste/ /rnam pa brgyad kyi bdag nyid 'di/ /nges 'byung bsgrub
<p>95a.4</p>pa yin zhes bya/ /zhes bya ba gsungs te/ ched du bya ba ji skad bshad pa dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid dang / sems can gyi don phyad par byed pa dang / mtshan ma med par thams cad byed pa nyid kyis lhun gyis grub pa dang / rtag pa dang chad pa dang bral ba'i ngo bo'i gnas
<p>95a.5</p>skabs kyi khyad par dang / theg pa gsum gyi don thams cad 'thob pa dang / ji skad bshad pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / de'i khyad par gyi lam ste/ nges par 'byung bar bya ba'i gzhi de lta bu dag las khyad par du 'phags pa'i chos gzhan med pa'i phyir thams cad
<p>95a.6</p>mi dmigs pa nyid kyis nges par 'byung ba rnam pa brgyad yin pas nges par 'byung ba'i sgrub pa ni rnam pa brgyad yin no/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i man ngag gi bstan bcos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan ces bya ba las/ skabs dang po'i 'grel pa'o// //rnam pa thams
<p>95a.7</p>cad mkhyen pa nyid rtogs pa ni lam shes pa nyid yongs su shes pa med na med pas lam shes pa nyid/ lha rnams rung bar bya ba'i phyir/ /'od kyis mog mog por mdzad dang / /yul nges pa dang khyab pa dang / /rang bzhin dang ni de yi las/ /zhes bya ba gsungs te/ lam
<p>95b</p>
<p>95b.1</p>shes pa nyid skye bar rung ba nyid du bsgrub pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin gyi 'od dag gis lha la sogs pa'i rnam par smin pa'i 'od mog mog por mdzad pa ni nga rgyal bcom pa'i rgyud kho na la rtogs pa skye'o zhes bya bar shes par bya ba'i phyir mdzad de/ de'i phyir tshig
<p>95b.2</p>zur gyis rten brjod pa yin no/ /de yang byang chub tu sems bskyed pa kho na yin pas yul so sor nges pa yin no/ /theg pa gsum rnam par bzhag pa ni dgongs pa can yin gyi/ mtshan nyid pa ni ma yin no zhes lugs las 'byung bas skye bo thams cad bla na med pa yang dag
<p>95b.3</p>par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi mthar thug pa can yin te/ de'i phyir 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / cig shos kyi rnal 'byor pas kyang sangs rgyas nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir lam shes pa nyid bsgom par bya ba yin pas khyab pa yin no/ /byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ni 'khor ba
<p>95b.4</p>ji srid par sems can gyi don byed par zhugs pa nyid kyis nyon mongs pa rnam pa thams cad du spangs pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin yin no/ /de'i 'og tu de lta bu'i rang bzhin can gyi las ni yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du mi byed pa dang shes rab dang thabs la mkhas pas
<p>95b.5</p>sems can yongs su ma bsdus pa yongs su sdud pa la sogs pa yin pas byed pa yin no/ /de ltar rten la sogs pa brjod nas lam shes pa nyid kyi skabs su lam thams cad rdzogs par bya dgos pas/ nyan thos kyi lam/ lam shes nyid kyi tshul la ni/ /'phags
<p>95b.6</p>pa'i bden pa bzhi dag gi/ /rnam pa mi dmigs sgo nas ni/ /nyan thos lam 'di shes par bya/ /zhes bya ba gsungs te/ de la sdug bsngal gyi bden pa'i go rims bzhin du/ mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med pa ste/ de dag gi mtshan
<p>95b.7</p>nyid zhi ba'i rnam pa bzhi dag dang / kun 'byung ba'i bden pa'i rgyu dang / kun 'byung ba dang / rab tu skye ba dang / rkyen gyi ngo bo nyid dang / nad dang / 'bras dang / zug rngu dang / sdig pa'i rnam pa rnams dang / yid 'byung ba dang / 'dod chags dang bral bar bya ba dang / 'gog
<p>96a</p>
<p>96a.1</p>pa'i phyir zhugs pa yin no zhes 'byung ba'i phyir/ sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung gi bden pa de dag nyid so so'i yid 'byung ba dag gi mtshan nyid kyi pha rol dang 'jig pa'i chos can gyi rnam pa'i ngo bo nyid dag dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba dag gi ngo bo g.yo ba dang
<p>96a.2</p>rab tu 'jig pa'i rnam pa dag dang / 'gog pa'i rang gi ngo bo 'jigs pa dang nad 'go ba dang 'tshe ba'i rnam pa rnams dang / 'gog pa'i bden pa'i 'gog pa'i rang gi ngo bo bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang gya nom pa'i rnam pa'i bdag nyid dben pa dang / nges par 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid
<p>96a.3</p>stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i rnam pa dag dang / lam gyi bden pa'i lam dang / rigs pa dang / sgrub pa dang / nges par 'byin pa'i rnam pa rnams/ ngo bo nyid mi dmigs pa'i sgo nas lam shes pa nyid kyi skabs su nyan thos
<p>96a.4</p>rnams kyi lam yin par byang chub sems dpas de ltar yongs su shes par bya'o/ /bden pa bzhi yongs su shes pa ni/ nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa rtogs pa sngon du 'gro ba can yin pas lam brjod nas nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa/ 'phags pa nyan thos lam
<p>96a.5</p>la ni/ /gzugs la sogs pa stong pa'i phyir/ /stong pa nyid rnams dbyer med pas/ /dro ba de dag mi dmigs pas/ /rtse mor gyur pa dag tu 'dod/ /de la rtag la sogs tshul gyis/ /gnas pa bkag pas bzod pa rnams/ /sa bcu dag las brtsams nas ni/ /
<p>96a.6</p>mi gnas rgyas par bstan pa yis/ /chos kyi mchog tu 'gyur bshad de/ /ci phyir zhe na sangs rgyas kyis/ /mkhyen nas chos rnams ma gzigs phyir/ /zhes bya ba gsungs te/ gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po rang rang gi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir stong pa nyid rnams
<p>96a.7</p>phan tshun tha dad pa med pa dang / gzugs la sogs pa snga ma bzhin du mi dmigs pa dang de bzhin du gzugs la sogs pa la rtag pa'ang ma yin mi rtag pa yang ma yin no zhes dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas pa bkag pa dang / gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pas byang
<p>96b</p>
<p>96b.1</p>chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos rnams ma gzigs pa zhes bya ba tshad ma'i skyes bus ma dmigs pa'i gtan tshigs kyi 'thad pas/ sa rab tu dga' ba la sogs pa la mi gnas pa rgyas par ji skad du bstan pa zhes bya ba'i rnam pa de rnams kyis/ go rims bzhin
<p>96b.2</p>du bden pa'i dmigs pa la nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa skye bo zhes bya ba yin no/ /nyan thos kyi lam gyi mjug thogs su rang sangs rgyas kyi lam brjod par rigs mod kyi/ nyan thos rnams las de dag ji ltar khyad par du 'phags na gang gis na de dag gi lam gzhan yin snyam
<p>96b.3</p>pa'i dogs pa bsu bar re zhig khyad zhugs pa nyid du sgrub pa/ rang byung bdag nyid rtogs pa'i phyir/ /gzhan gyis bstan yang mi dgos la/ /bse ru lta bu'i ye shes ni/ /zab pa nyid du mngon par brjod/ /ces bya ba gsungs te/ lung las nyan thos rnams ni gzhan
<p>96b.4</p>gyis bstan pa la ltos nas rang gi byang chub rtogs par 'gyur la/ gzhan dag kyang brjod pa dang bcas pa'i chos bstan pas dge ba la 'jug par byed do zhes 'byung ngo / /rang sangs rgyas rnams ni sngon thos pa la sogs pa mngon par 'dus byas pas gzhan gyis bstan pa la mi ltos 
<p>96b.5</p>par bdag nyid kyis rang gi byang chub mngon par rtogs par 'gyur te/ de'i phyir de dag la sangs rgyas la sogs pas bstan mi dgos so zhes bya ba ni khyad zhugs pa nyid gcig yin no/ /sgrar brjod pa'i chos bstan pa'i sgo nas nyan pa po rnams kyis 'chad pa po'i shes pa'i
<p>96b.6</p>rtsal rtogs par byed na/ de dag ni rang gis thob pa'i ye shes la sogs pa'i mthus sgra med pa'i chos bstan pas/ gzhan dag dge ba bcu la sogs pa la 'jug par byed de/ de'i phyir de dag gi ye shes mi rtogs pa nyid ni khyad zhugs pa gnyis pa yin no/ /yang ji ltar
<p>96b.7</p>sgra med par chos ston snyam pa'i dogs pa bsu bar/ gang gang don ni gang gang la/ /ji lta ji ltar nyan 'dod pa/ /de de la don de dang de/ /sgra med kyang de de ltar snang / /zhes bya ba gsungs te/ rnam par ma brtags rnam par ma dpyad par tshig tu mi smra bas brjod pa ni rnam
<p>97a</p>
<p>97a.1</p>par g.yeng ba yin la/ de yang rgyud 'khrug par byed pa yin pas/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar sangs rgyas su gyur nas brjod pa med par chos ston par gyur cig ces smon lam btab po/ /de bas na sangs rgyas dang 'dra ba'i phyir/ rang sangs
<p>97a.2</p>rgyas nyid kyi gnas skabs na yang smon lam la sogs pa'i mthus/ sgra med kyang gang zhig don gang la rnam pa ji ltar nyan par 'dod pa de'i rnam par shes pa la don de rnam pa de kho na ltar snang bar 'gyur bas sgra med par chos ston pa zhes bya ste/ chos ston pa'i sgra'i don ni 'di
<p>97a.3</p>ltar brjod par bya ba'i chos nyan pa po'i rnam par shes pa la shin tu bskrun cing bskyed pa zhes bya ba 'di yin no/ /de ltar khyad zhugs pa brjod nas khyad zhugs pa rnams kyi lam ni khyad par du 'phags pa kho na yin pas rnal ma rang sangs rgyas kyi lam/ gzung don rtog pa
<p>97a.4</p>spong phyir dang / /'dzin pa mi spong phyir dang ni/ /rten gyis bse ru lta bu'i lam/ /yang dag bsdus par shes par bya/ /zhes bya ba gsungs te/ rang sangs rgyas kyi lam la ji skad bshad pa'i bden pa sgom pa kho na dang / dngos po ji lta ba bzhin du rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba
<p>97a.5</p>bsgoms pas gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i don gyi rnam par rtog pa dag go rims bzhin du spangs pa dang ma spangs pa dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas bsdus pa'i rten pa'i chos kyi gzhi'i khyad par gyis khyad par du 'phags pa dang ldan pa'i chos rtogs par byang chub sems dpas shes par bya'i
<p>97a.6</p>rnam pa thams cad shes par ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni rang sangs rgyas kyi lam mo/ /nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa thob na ji skad bshad pa'i lam skye bas nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa/ btags pa'i chos nyid mi 'gal bar/ /ston pa'i rnam pa dror gyur pa/ /rtse mor
<p>97a.7</p>gyur pa gzugs la sogs/ /'grib pa med la sogs pas phye/ /nang stong nyid la sogs pa yis/ /gzugs sogs mi 'dzin phyir bzod pa/ /gzugs sogs skye ba med sogs kyi/ /rnam pa can ni chos kyi mchog /ces bya ba gsungs te/ gzugs la sogs
<p>97b</p>
<p>97b.1</p>pa'i chos kyi brda las byung ba'i btags pa'i chos nyid dang mi 'gal bar rab tu ston pa dang / gzugs la sogs pa la don dam par 'grib pa dang 'phel ba med pa la sogs pa'i don du slob pa dang / ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir gzugs la sogs pa la nang dang phyi la sogs
<p>97b.2</p>pa stong pa nyid kyis yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / gzugs la sogs pa skye ba dang 'gag pa la sogs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i rnam pa rnams kyis go rims bzhin du bden pa bzhi'i dmigs pa la nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa skye ba yin no/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi lam gyi mjug
<p>97b.3</p>thogs su byang chub sems dpa'i lam/ bden dang bden la bzod pa dang / /shes pa'i skad cig rnam bzhi yis/ /lam shes nyid la mthong ba'i lam/ /phan yon bcas pa 'di bshad do/ /zhes bya ba gsungs te/ lam shes pa nyid kyi skabs su byang chub sems
<p>97b.4</p>dpas chos shes pa'i bzod pa dang / chos shes pa dang / rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa dang / rjes su shes pa zhes bya ba bzod pa dang / shes pa'i skad cig ma bzhi po so sor sdug bsngal la sogs pa'i bden pa dang 'brel ba dag dang ldan pa 'di dang gzhan pa'i yon tan dag dang
<p>97b.5</p>ldan pa bsgom par bya ba ni mthong ba'i lam phan yon chen po zhes brjod do/ /rnam pa ji lta bur bsgom par bya zhe na/ de bzhin nyid dang sangs rgyas dag /phan tshun rten pa rten med phyir/ /rnam grangs khas mi len pa dang / /chen po tshad ma med bcas dang / /tshad
<p>97b.6</p>med pa dang mtha' med dang / /der gnas gzugs la sogs pa la/ /sangs rgyas nyid du nges 'dzin dang / /blang med dor ba med sogs dang / /byams la sogs dang stong nyid dang / /sangs rgyas nyid ni 'thob pa dang / /rnam par byang kun yongs bsdus dang / /nyam
<p>97b.7</p>nga ba dang nad kun sel/ /mya ngan 'das 'dzin zhi nyid dang / /sangs rgyas rnams kyis srung la sogs/ /srog mi gcod pa la sogs pa/ /rnam pa kun mkhyen tshul la ni/ /bdag nyid gnas te sems can dag /'god dang sbyin pa la sogs pa/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub
<p>98a</p>
<p>98a.1</p>tu bsngo ba/ /lam shes nyid kyi skad cig ma/ /zhes bya ba gsungs te/ don dam pa'i tshul nyid kyis de bzhin nyid dang / sangs rgyas dag la rten dang brten pa'i dngos po med pas de'i phyir de dag phan tshun rnam grangs kyis gnas par khas mi len pa dang / 
<p>98a.2</p>gzugs la sogs pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid kyis chen po nyid dang / de bzhin du de dag tshad ma med pa nyid dang / snga ma bzhin du nam mkha' tshad med pa nyid kyis de dag tshad med pa zhes bya ba de lta bu ni sdug bsngal gyi bden pa'i rnam pa dag yin no/ /gzugs la sogs
<p>98a.3</p>pa la ngo bo nyid med pa nyid kyis rtag pa dang chad pa'i mtha' nyid la sogs pa med pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid kyis gzugs la sogs pa la de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du nges par 'dzin pa dang / de bzhin du de la gnas pa ni/ 
<p>98a.4</p>chos thams cad la blang ba dang dor ba med par sgom pa la sogs pa dang / ngo bo nyid med par mos pa sngon du 'gro ba'i tshad med pa bzhi bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba de lta bu ni kun 'byung ba'i bden pa'i rnam pa dag yin no/ /gzugs la sogs pa'i ngo bo gnyug ma rang bzhin kho nas stong
<p>98a.5</p>pa nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyi 'bras bu de bzhin gshegs pa nyid 'thob pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par gnyen po rnams rnam pa thams cad du bsdus pa dang / de nyid kyis phyi dang nang gi 'tshe ba rab tu zhi ba zhes bya ba de lta bu ni 'gog pa'i
<p>98a.6</p>bden pa'i rnam pa dag yin no/ /ngo bo nyid med pa sgom pa kho nas gzugs la sogs pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la mngon par zhen pa zhi ba dang / shes rab dang thabs la mkhas pa la zhugs pa la sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsrung ba dang bskyab pa dang sba ba dag mdzad pa dang / 
<p>98a.7</p>sangs rgyas nyid mngon par 'dod pas bdag nyid srog gcod pa spong ba la sogs pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas nas de nyid la gzhan dag 'god pa dang / sbyin pa la sogs pa mi zad par byed 'dod pas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngo bar bya'o zhes bya
<p>98b</p>
<p>98b.1</p>ba de lta bu ni lam gyi bden pa'i rnam pa dag yin te/ de lta bu ni lam shes pa nyid kyi skad cig ma dag yin no/ /kha cig ni 'dir tshig le'ur byas pa'i don nye bar mtshon pa lhur len pa'i gzhung gis rnam pa'i don ma bshad par mthong ba'i lam gyi skad cig ma bcu drug nye bar
<p>98b.2</p>mtshon pa nyi tshe mdzad pa zad de/ bshad pa dang ma bshad pa'i nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa la sogs pa'i don gyi tshig le'ur byas pa rnams su'ang de bzhin du blta bar bya'o zhes zer ro/ /gzhan dag na re de dag gis ni bsgom pa'i rim pa la sogs pa ma bstan pa'i phyir/ 
<p>98b.3</p>mngon par rtogs pa'i rim pa cung zad kyang ma bstan to/ /gzhan yang dmigs pa dang ni rnam pa dang / /zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa'i don kyang ji ltar drang zhes zer ro/ /mthong ba'i lam gyi mjug thogs su bsgom pa'i lam brjod par bya ba yin pa las/ 
<p>98b.4</p>brjod par bya ba nyung ba nyid dang gdul bya 'bras bu la gzhol ba nyid du zhugs pa'i phyir re zhig de'i byed pa/ kun nas zhi dang thams cad la/ /'dud dang nyon mongs las rgyal dang / gnod pas brdzi ba med nyid dang / /byang chub dang ni rten mchod nyid/ /ces bya ba gsungs te/ 
<p>98b.5</p>rnam pa thams cad du sems la rang dbang nyid du byed pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la sogs pa skye bo thams cad la 'dud pa dang / 'dod chags la sogs pa zil gyis gnon pa dang / pha rol gyis byas pa'i gnod pa rjes su sgrub pa'i yul ma yin pa nyid dang / 
<p>98b.6</p>yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sgrub pa dang / rten gyi yul mchod par bya ba nyid du byed pa zhes bya ba byed pa rnam pa drug yin no/ /byed pa'i 'og tu bsgom pa'i lam ste/ de yang zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa'i bye brag gis rnam pa gnyis so/ /de'i phyir bsgom pa'i
<p>98b.7</p>lam zag pa dang bcas pa mos pa dang / bsngo ba dang rjes su yi rang ba yid la byed pa zhes bya ba rnams kyi nang nas bsgom pa'i lam dang po mos pa yid la byed pa zhes bya ba/ mos pa rang gi don dang ni/ /rang gzhan don dang gzhan don dang / /rnam gsum shes bya de yang ni/ /
<p>99a</p>
<p>99a.1</p>chung dang 'bring dang chen po ste/ /so sor rnam pa gsum du 'dod/ /chung ngu'i chung sogs dbye ba yis/ /de yang rnam gsum de ltar na/ /rnam pa nyi shu bdun du 'dod/ /ces bya ba gsungs te/ rang dang gnyis ka dang gzhan gyi don la dmigs pa nyid
<p>99a.2</p>ji ltar mos pa bzhin mthong ba'i dge ba'i chos kyi rten yin na yang bsgom pa'i lam gyi dbang du byas pa las dang por mngon du mi byed pa'i ngo bo yang rnam pa gsum mo/ /de dag kyang re re zhing chung ngu la sogs pa'i bye brag gis rnam pa gsum yin la/ de yang so sor chung ngu'i chung
<p>99a.3</p>ngu la sogs pa'i dbye bas rnam pa gsum yin te/ de ltar na dgu tshan gsum gyis mos pa rnam pa nyi shu rtsa bdun no/ /de sgom pa'i byang chub sems dpa' spro ba bskyed pa'i phyir/ de ltar mos pa la sangs rgyas la sogs pas bstod pa la sogs pa mdzad do/ /zhes
<p>99a.4</p>bstod pa dang bkur ba dang bsngags pa/ shes rab pha rol phyin pa la/ /mos pa'i gnas skabs rnams la ni/ /dgu tshan gsum gyis bstod pa dang / /bkur ba dang ni bsngags par 'dod/ /ces bya ba gsungs te/ ji ltar mos pa bzhin mthong ba'i chos kyi mtshan
<p>99a.5</p>nyid kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la zhugs pa'i mos pa yid la byed pa dang po dang gnyis pa dang gsum pa ste/ gnas skabs dgu dag tu so sor rnam pa dgus go rims bzhin du gong nas gong du mngon par dga' bar byed cing bstod pa dang / bkur ba dang / bsngags par 'dod
<p>99a.6</p>de des na bstod pa la sogs pa 'di dag ni don yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid can yin gyi gcam bu'i ngo bo ni ma yin no/ /de ltar mos pa la bsngo ba 'byung bas gnyis pa bsngo ba yid la byed pa zhes bya ba/ yongs su bsngo ba khyad par can/ /de yi byed pa
<p>99a.7</p>mchog yin no/ /de ni dmigs med rnam pa can/ /phyin ci ma log mtshan nyid do/ /dben dang sangs rgyas bsod nams tshogs/ /rang bzhin dran pa'i spyod yul can/ /thabs bcas mtshan ma med pa dang / /sangs rgyas rjes su yi rang dang / /khams gsum
<p>99b</p>
<p>99b.1</p>gtogs pa ma yin dang / /chung dang 'bring dang chen po yi/ /bsngo ba gzhan ni rnam gsum po/ /bsod nams che 'byung bdag nyid do/ /zhes bya ba gsungs te/ ji skad bshad pa'i mos pa khyad par can dang / mi dmigs pa dang / phyin ci ma log pa dang / dben pa dang / 
<p>99b.2</p>de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs kyi rang bzhin dran pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang bcas pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba dang / khams gsum par ma gtogs pa dang / chung ngu dang / 'bring dang / chen po ste/ bsod nams
<p>99b.3</p>chen po 'byung ba zhes bya ba de ltar ming du btags pa'i yid la byed pa go rims bzhin du bla na med pa'i byang chub dang / tshul khrims la sogs pa'i phung po dang / sngo bar byed pa'i sems dang / bdag la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i dngos po dang / dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi
<p>99b.4</p>dge ba dang / sbyin pa la sogs pa dang / mtshan ma dang / lam thams cad dang / 'dod pa la sogs pa'i khams dang / dge ba bcu la sogs pa'i las kyi lam dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa la sogs pa dang / bla na med pa'i byang chub la gnas pa rnams mi dmigs pa
<p>99b.5</p>la dmigs pa / theg pa gsum gyis gdul bar bya ba'i sems can la lam nye bar ston pa'i rgyu'i ngo bo byed pa dang ldan pa rnams kyis sems can thams cad kyi don du mi zad par bya ba'i phyir/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngo ba rnam pa bcu gnyis byed do/ /de
<p>99b.6</p>ltar legs par bsngos pa'i dngos po mngon par spel bar bya ba yin pas gsum pa rjes su yi rang ba yid la byed pa zhes bya ba/ thabs dang mi dmigs pa dag gis/ /dge ba'i rtsa la yi rang ba/ /rjes su yi rang yid byed pa/ /bsgom pa yin par 'dir brjod do/ /
<p>99b.7</p>zhes bya ba gsungs te/ rab tu dga' ba'i sems kyis kun rdzob tu thabs kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams dmigs nas don dam par mi dmigs pa nyid kyis rjes su yi rang bar bya ba dag yin no/ /de la bsdus pa'i don ni mos pa yid la byed pas ni 'byung khungs dag nas gser
<p>100a</p>
<p>100a.1</p>gyi gar bu bzhin du bsod nams mngon par 'du byed do/ /bsngo ba yid la byed pas ni de gser mgar gyis rgyan bzhin du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi yan lag tu byed do/ /rjes su yi rang ba yid la byed pas ni rang dang gzhan gyi bsod nams
<p>100a.2</p>byas pa mnyam pa nyid 'thob bo zhes bya ba 'di yin no/ /zag pa dang bcas pa'i 'og tu zag pa med pa'i bsgom pa'i lam ste/ de yang rnam pa gnyis so/ /de'i phyir dang po mngon par sgrub pa'i mtshan nyid kyi bsgom pa'i lam/ de yi ngo bo nyid mchog nyid/ /kun la mngon par 'du mi
<p>100a.3</p>byed/ /chos rnams dmigs su med par ni/ /gtod par byed pa don chen nyid/ /ces bya ba gsungs te/ gzugs la sogs pa phyin ci ma log par mthong ba ni ngo bo nyid do/ /gzhan gyis sangs rgyas nyid mi 'thob pa ni mchog nyid do/ /chos thams cad kyi khyad par skye ba med
<p>100a.4</p>par rtogs par sbyor ba ni kun la mngon par 'du mi byed pa'o/ /de lta bu'i ngo bo nyid la sogs pa dang ldan pa'i lam gyi chos rnams mi dmigs pa nyid du rnal 'byor pa'i rgyud la skyed pa ni gtod par byed pa'o/ /don chen po sangs rgyas nyid du byed pa'i phyir don chen po nyid do/ /de'i 'og
<p>100a.5</p>tu gang zhig yongs su bzung ba dang bor bas 'thob par 'gyur ba 'di'i skye ba dang mi skye ba'i rgyu gang zhig yin snyam pa'i the tshom bsal ba'i sgo nas gnyis pa shin tu rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid/ sangs rgyas bsten dang sbyin sogs dang / /thabs la mkhas pa gang yin pa/ /'di la
<p>100a.6</p>mos pa'i rgyu dag yin/ /chos kyis phongs pa'i rgyu dag ni/ /bdud kyi thibs kyis non pa dang / /zab mo'i chos la ma mos dang / /phung po la sogs mngon zhen dang / /sdig pa'i grogs pos yongs zin pa'o/ /zhes bya ba gsungs te/ sangs rgyas mnyes par byed pa
<p>100a.7</p>dang / sbyin pa la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rdzogs par byed pa dang / zhi gnas la mkhas pa zhes bya ba ni skye ba'i rgyu dag yin no/ /bdud kyis gnod pa byas pa dang / chos zab mo la ma mos pa dang / dngos por 'dzin pa dang / mi dge ba'i grogs po dang 'grogs
<p>100b</p>
<p>100b.1</p>pa zhes bya ba ni mi skye ba'i rgyu dag yin no/ /de ltar 'thob pa dang mi 'thob pa'i rgyu dag bshad nas/ skabs su bab pa'i rnam par dag pa spyir/ 'bras bu dag pa gzugs la sogs/ /dag pa nyid de gang gi phyir/ /de gnyis tha dad ma yin zhing / /bcad du med pas
<p>100b.2</p>dag par brjod/ /ces bya ba gsungs te/ 'phags pa'i gang zag gi dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu gang yin pa de'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad dang bral ba nyid kyis rnam par dag pa gang yin pa de nyid/ gzugs la sogs pa rnam par dag pa yin te/ 'bras bu dang
<p>100b.3</p>gzugs la sogs pa rnam par dag pa ni gzugs la sogs pa la bdag tu mngon par zhen pa la sogs pa dang bral bas rab tu phye ba nyid kyis/ gang gi phyir de dag gi rnam par dag pa tha mi dad cing bcad du med pa nyid de/ rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid tha dad pa nyid ma yin pa de'i phyir
<p>100b.4</p>de ltar rnam par dag par brjod do/ /rnam par dag pa spyir brjod nas da ni khyad par du/ nyon mongs shes bya lam gsum gyi/ /nyams phyir slob ma bse ru dang / /rgyal sras rnams kyi dag pa ste/ /sangs rgyas rnam kun shin du ba/ /zhes bya ba gsungs te/ 'dod chags
<p>100b.5</p>la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa dang / /de dang shes bya'i sgrib pa'i phyogs gcig po gzung ba'i don gyi rnam par rtog pa dang theg pa gsum gyi lam gyi sgrib pa gsum spangs pa'i phyir go rims bzhin du nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dag pa yin no/ /
<p>100b.6</p>nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa bag chags dang bcas pa rnam pa thams cad du spangs pa'i phyir shin tu rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings las byung ba nyid ni bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yin par 'dod do/ /lam shes pa nyid kyi skabs su rnam par dag pa smos pa'i zhar la sangs
<p>100b.7</p>rgyas dang nyan thos la sogs pa'i rnam par dag pa go rims bzhin du/ shin tu ba dang cig shos su bshad pa de ji lta bu yin zhe na/ sa dgu la ni chen po yi/ /chen po la sogs dri ma yi/ /gnyen po chung ngu'i chung ngu la/ /sogs pa'i lam ni dag pa yin/ /zhes bya ba gsungs
<p>101a</p>
<p>101a.1</p>te/ 'dod pa'i khams dang / bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag ste/ sa dgu la mi mthun pa'i phyogs chen po'i chen po la sogs pa rnam pa dgu'i gnyen po'i ngo bor go rims bzhin du lam chung ngu'i chung ngu la
<p>101a.2</p>sogs pa rnam pa dgu rnam pa thams cad dang / cig shos su rnam par dag pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa shin tu ba dang cig shos zhes bya'o/ /ji ltar shin tu ba yin zhe na/ de la klan ka spangs pa yis/ /lam ni 'jal dang gzhal bya dag /mnyam pa nyid
