<p>101a.3</p>kyis khams gsum gyi/ /gnyen po nyid du 'dod pa yin/ /zhes bya ba gsungs te/ de la gnyen po ni chen po'i chen po la sogs pa mi mthun pa'i phyogs ni chung ngu'i chung ngu la sogs par rigs so zhes bya ba'i klan ka /gos la chags pa'i dri ma phra mo bsal ba la
<p>101a.4</p>btso blag mkhan che thang du 'bad pa'i dpes spangs pa'i sgo nas bsgom pa'i lam shin tu ba ji skad du bstan pa de/ khams gsum pa'i rnam pa can gyi shes pa dang shes bya dag mi dmigs pa nyid kyis mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa de nyid mtha' dag gi gnyen po'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i
<p>101a.5</p>phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par dag pa shin tu ba yin par rnam par bzhag go/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i man ngag gi bstan bcos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan ces bya ba las skabs gnyis pa'i 'grel pa'o// //gzhi thams cad yongs su shes pa med par
<p>101a.6</p>lam legs par yongs su shes pa med pas thams cad shes pa nyid/ tshu rol pha rol mtha' la min/ /de dag bar na mi gnas pa/ /dus rnams mnyam pa nyid shes phyir/ /shes rab pha rol phyin par 'dod/ /ces bya ba gsungs te/ dus gsum pa'i chos rnams skye
<p>101a.7</p>ba med pa'i rnam pa mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pas/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la nye bar gyur par 'dod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyis tshu rol gyi mtha' 'khor ba dang / snying rjes pha rol gyi mtha' mya ngan las 'das pa ste/ 
<p>101b</p>
<p>101b.1</p>go rims bzhin du rtag pa dang chad pa'i mtshan nyid dang de dag gi bar na yang mi gnas pas srid pa dang zhi ba la mi gnas pa yin no/ /kun shes pa nyid kyi skabs las bzlog ste bstan pas/ nyan thos la sogs pa la dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du shes pa med pa'i phyir/ yang
<p>101b.2</p>dag pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ring bar gyur pas rang gi rtogs pa tsam gyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa snying brtse ba dang shes rab dang bral ba'i phyir dngos po dang / dngos po med par dmigs pa nyid kyis 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas pa yin par shes par
<p>101b.3</p>bya'o/ /lugs las/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba gang / /de nyid khyod ni stong par bzhed/ /ces 'byung ba'i phyir/ dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du shes pa ni gzhi rtogs pa kho na yin la/ de yang thams cad la yod pa nyid ma yin nam/ ji ltar na nyan thos dang
<p>101b.4</p>byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa la yang dag pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ring ba dang cig shos su 'gyur zhe na/ de ni mtshan mar dmigs sgo nas/ /thabs ma yin pas ring ba ste/ /de ni thabs la mkhas pa yis/ /yang dag nye ba nyid du bshad/ /
<p>101b.5</p>ces bya ba gsungs te/ sgyu ma mkhan gyis sprul pa'i dngos po snang ba la de'i rang gi ngo bo mi shes pas dngos por mngon par zhen pa nyid kyis ngo bo nyid med par mi snang ba bzhin du/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la sogs pa thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba'i phyir dngos po mtshan ma
<p>101b.6</p>dang ldan par rtogs pas nyan thos la sogs pa dngos po'i ngo bo mi shes pa rnams la mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes med de/ de'i phyir de dag la rgyal ba'i yum ring bar gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' dus ring mo zhig nas dge ba'i bshes gnyen yang dag par mgu
<p>101b.7</p>bar byas pa'i man ngag phyin ci ma log pa can bden pa gnyis la rten pa'i thos pa la sogs pa'i skye ba'i thabs la mkhas pas/ dngos por mngon par zhen pa'i 'khrul pa'i mtshan ma bsal ba rnams la ni/ gzugs la sogs pa'i chos yongs su shes pa de nyid mnyam pa
<p>102a</p>
<p>102a.1</p>nyid du yongs su shes pa yin te/ de'i phyir de dag la yum 'di yang dag par nye bar gyur pas/ thabs ma yin pas ni ring ba nyid yin la thabs kyis ni mi ring ba nyid yin no/ /de ltar nyan thos la sogs pa'i yum ring bar gyur pa'i bsgrub pa nyid mi
<p>102a.2</p>mthun pa'i phyogs yin par/ gzugs sogs phung po stong nyid dang / /dus gsum gtogs pa'i chos rnams dang / /sbyin sogs byang chub phyogs rnams la/ /spyod pa'i 'du shes mi mthun phyogs/ /zhes bya ba gsungs te/ gzugs la sogs pa dus gsum pa'i
<p>102a.3</p>chos zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa dang / gnyis ka'i ngo bo dngos por ma gyur pa thams cad la/ dngos por dmigs pa nyid kyis gzhan gyis kun brtags pa'i bdag la sogs pa stong pa nyid du lta ba dang / sgrub pa'i 'du shes ni de dag gi gnyen po yin na yang phyin ci
<p>102a.4</p>log tu zhugs pa nyid kyis spang bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir/ mi mthun pa'i phyogs yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bzlog ste gnyen po yin par/ sbyin la sogs la ngar 'dzin med/ /gzhan dag de la sbyor byed pa/ /de ni chags pa'i mtha' 'gog pas/ /rgyal
<p>102a.5</p>la sogs la chags pa phra/ /zhes bya ba gsungs te/ 'khor gsum rnam par dag pas sbyin pa la sogs pa la bdag med par rtogs pas rang dang gzhan sbyor ba ni/ yang dag par zhugs pa'i phyir dang chags pa'i tshogs kyi gnas thams cad bkag pas blang bar bya ba yin
<p>102a.6</p>pa'i phyir/ rnam pa thams cad du gnyen po yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa la phyag 'tshal ba la sogs pa ni bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi rgyu yin pa nyid kyis gnyen po yin mod kyi/ chags pa phra mo'i ngo bo nyid kyis rnam pa thams cad du ma yin pas mi mthun pa'i
<p>102a.7</p>phyogs yin no// //bam po gsum pa/ yang ji ltar chags pa phra mo mi mthun pa'i phyogs yin zhe na/ chos kyi lam ni rang bzhin gyis/ /dben pa'i phyir na de zab nyid/ /ces bya ba gsungs te/ gang gi phyir chos kyi rigs rnams ngo bo nyid kho nas stong
<p>102b</p>
<p>102b.1</p>pas/ de dag zab pa nyid yin pa de'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa la dmigs pa yang mi mthun pa'i phyogs yin no/ /'o na ji ltar spang zhe na/ chos rnams rang bzhin gcig par ni/ /shes pas chags pa spong ba yin/ /zhes bya ba gsungs te/ gzugs la sogs
<p>102b.2</p>pa'i chos thams cad rang bzhin gcig pa kho na ste/ 'di lta ste rang bzhin med pa zhes shes pa dang shes bya mnyam pa nyid du gcig par yongs su shes pa ni chags pa spong ba yin no/ /yang ji ltar chos rnams rang bzhin gyis zab pa yin zhe na/ mthong ba la sogs bkag pa
<p>102b.3</p>yis/ /de ni rtogs par dka' bar bshad/ /ces bya ba gsungs te/ gang gi phyir rnam par shes pa thams cad kyis dmigs pa'i don bsal bas rang bzhin de rtogs par dka' ba nyid du bshad pa de'i phyir de zab pa nyid yin no/ /yang de ltar rtogs par dka' ba nyid ci yin
<p>102b.4</p>zhe na/ gzugs la sogs par mi shes phyir/ /de ni bsam mi khyab par 'dod/ /ces bya ba gsungs te/ gang gi phyir gzugs la sogs pa nas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i rnam pa'i bar gyi rang bzhin yongs su mi shes pas bsam pa las 'das pa nyid du 'dod pa
<p>102b.5</p>de'i phyir/ de ni rtogs par dka' ba nyid yin no/ /de ltar mi mthun pa'i phyogs la sogs pa brjod nas mjug bsdu bar/ de ltar kun shes nyid lugs la/ /mi mthun gnyen po'i phyogs dag gi /rnam par dbye ba ma lus pa/ /ji skad bshad pa 'dir shes bya/ /
<p>102b.6</p>zhes bya ba gsungs te/ thams cad shes pa nyid kyi skabs su de ltar bshad pa'i tshul gyis go rims bzhin du nyan thos dang byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang gnyen po'i rab tu dbye ba shes par bya'o/ de ltar mi mthun pa'i phyogs la sogs pa brjod nas/ 
<p>102b.7</p>de dag rnam par bsgom pa'i sbyor ba gang yin zhe na/ sbyor ba / gzugs sogs de mi rtag sogs dang / /de ma rdzogs dang rab rdzogs dang / /de la chags pa med nyid la/ /spyod pa bkag pa'i sbyor ba dang / /mi 'gyur byed po med nyid dang / /bya dka' rnam
<p>103a</p>
<p>103a.1</p>gsum sbyor ba dang / /skal ba ji bzhin 'bras thob pas/ /'bras yod 'dod pa de dang ni/ /gzhan las rag las med gang dang / /snang ba rnam bdun shes byed do/ /zhes bya ba gsungs te/ gzugs la sogs pa'i chos thams cad dang / 
<p>103a.2</p>de dag nyid kyi mi rtag pa dang / stong pa nyid la sogs pa dang / so sor ma rdzogs pa dang rdzogs pa nyid dang / chags pa med pa dang / gzhan du mi 'gyur ba dang / byed pa po med pa nyid dang / go rims bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gsum gyi bdag nyid kyi ched
<p>103a.3</p>du bya ba dang sbyor ba dang byed pa rnams kyi bya dka' ba nyid dang / skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du 'bras bu 'thob pas mi stong pa nyid dang / gzhan gyi rkyen gyis mi 'gro ba nyid dang / yongs su 'gyur ba dang / mnyam du tshogs pa dang / 'gal ba dang / rkyen dang / ma 'phos
<p>103a.4</p>pa dang / rten med pa dang / byed pa po ma yin pa rnams su shes pa la snang ba bdun la sgrub pa'i yongs su shes pa bsal ba'i sgo nas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi de dang de la sbyor ba rnam pa bcu rjes su 'gro ba'i sgo nas bstan pas/ shugs kyis na nyan thos
<p>103a.5</p>la sogs pa'i ji skad bshad pa las bzlog ste sbyor ba yin no/ /mnyam pa nyid kyi sgo nas sbyor ba bsgom dgos pas/ sbyor ba'i 'og tu mnyam pa nyid/ /gzugs la sogs la rlom med pa/ /rnam bzhi de yi mnyam pa nyid/ /ces bya ba gsungs te/ gzugs
<p>103a.6</p>la sogs pa la mngon par zhen pa dang / sngon po la sogs pa'i mtshan ma dang / spros pa dang rtogs pa'i rlom pa rnams rnam pa thams cad du mi dmigs pa ni sbyor ba'i mnyam pa nyid yin no/ /sbyor ba'i mnyam pa nyid so sor rtogs nas mthong ba'i lam bsgom dgos pas mthong
<p>103a.7</p>ba'i lam/ sdug bsngal la sogs bden pa la/ /chos shes rjes su shes pa dang / /bzod shes skad cig bdag nyid 'di/ /kun shes tshul la mthong ba'i lam/ /zhes bya ba gsungs te/ bden pa so so la chos shes pa'i bzod pa dang / chos shes pa dang rjes
<p>103b</p>
<p>103b.1</p>su shes pa'i bzod pa dang rjes su shes pa ste/ de ltar skad cig ma bcu drug gi bdag nyid ni/ thams cad shes pa nyid kyi skabs su mthong ba'i lam yin no/ /bden pa'i rnam pa gang yin zhe na/ gzugs rtag ma yin mi rtag min/ /mtha' las 'das dang rnam dag
<p>103b.2</p>dang / /ma skyes ma 'gags la sogs dang / /mkha' 'dra chags pa spangs pa dang / /yongs su 'dzin las grol ba dang / /ngo bo nyid kyis brjod med dang / /gang phyir 'di don brjod pa yis/ /gzhan la sbyin du med pa dang / /dmigs pa med par byed pa dang / /
<p>103b.3</p>shin tu rnam dag nad mi 'byung / /ngan song chad dang 'bras bu ni/ /mngon du bya la mi rtog nyid/ /mtshan ma dag dang ma 'brel dang / /dngos dang ming dang gnyis po la/ /shes pa skye ba med pa ni/ /kun shes nyid kyi skad cig ma/ /zhes bya ba gsungs te/ ngo bo nyid
<p>103b.4</p>med pa'i phyir gzugs la sogs pa rtag pa dang mi rtag pa nyid dang bral bas na rtag pa yang ma yin mi rtag pa yang ma yin pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang sdug bsngal ba ma yin pa dang bral ba nyid kyis rtag pa dang chad pa'i mtha' dang bral ba dang stong pa dang mi stong pa dang bral ba'i
<p>103b.5</p>phyir rnam par dag pa dang / bdag dang bdag med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pas ma skyes pa dang / ma 'gags pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma yin pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ sdug bsngal gyi bden pa'i rnam pa dag yin no/ /rgyu dang rgyu
<p>103b.6</p>ma yin pa gsog nyid kyi phyir nam mkha' dang 'dra ba dang / kun 'byung ba dang / kun 'byung ba med pa dang / mi ldan pa'i phyir/ nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa dang / rab tu skye ba dang / rab tu mi skye ba dang ma 'brel bas yongs su 'dzin
<p>103b.7</p>pa las grol ba dang rkyen dang rkyen ma yin pa las rnam par grol ba'i phyir/ rang gi ngo bos brjod du med pa zhes bya ba ni kun 'byung ba'i bden pa yin no/ /gang gi phyir 'gog pa dang / 'gog pa med pa dang ma 'brel pa de'i phyir/ 'gog pa'i bden pa'i don tshig tu brjod
<p>104a</p>
<p>104a.1</p>pas rgyud gzhan la sbyin du med pa dang / zhi ba dang ma zhi ba med pas dmigs pa med par phyed pa dang / gya nom pa dang / gya nom pa ma yin pa dang bral ba'i phyir/ mtha' gnyis las 'das shing rnam par dag pa dang / nges par 'byung ba dang nges par
<p>104a.2</p>'byung ba med pa yang med pa'i phyir nad thams cad mi skye ba zhes bya ba ni 'gog pa'i bden pa yin no/ /lam dang lam ma yin pa dang bral ba'i phyir ngan song chad pa dang / rigs pa dang rigs pa ma yin pa dang ma 'dres pa'i phyir 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i don gyi thabs la
<p>104a.3</p>rnam par mi rtog pa nyid dang / sgrub pa dang sgrub pa ma yin pa las rnam par grol ba nyid kyis chos thams cad kyi mtshan ma dag dang ma 'brel pa dang / nges par 'byin pa dang nges par 'byin pa ma yin pa med pa nyid kyis brjod par bya ba dang rjod par byed pa'i ngo bo'i mtshan nyid
<p>104a.4</p>shes bya dang sgra gnyis la shes pa skye ba med pa zhes bya ba ni lam gyi bden pa yin te/ de lta bu'i rnam pa can gyi kun shes pa nyid kyi skad cig ma de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mthong ba'i lam yin no/ /nyan thos rnams kyis de las bzlog pa mi rtag pa la sogs
<p>104a.5</p>pa'i rnam pa dag tu bsgom par bya ba ni kun shes pa nyid la mthong ba'i lam yin no/ /nyan thos kyi lam ni byang chub sems dpas yongs su shes par bya ba yin gyi/ mngon du bya ba ni ma yin pas bsgom pa'i lam ni ma bstan to/ /de ltar rgyas par bstan nas don mtha'
<p>104a.6</p>dag sdud par byed pa nyid kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gsum mjug bsdu bar/ de ltar 'di dang yang 'di dang / /yang 'di yin te rnam gsum po/ /'di ni gnas skabs gsum po dag /rdzogs par yongs su bstan pa yin/ /zhes bya ba gsungs te/ bshad
<p>104a.7</p>ma thag pa'i tshul du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'di dang / lam shes pa nyid 'di dang / thams cad shes pa nyid 'di ste/ de ltar le'u gsum gyi rnam pa gsum po yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa yin no/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i man ngag gi bstan
<p>104b</p>
<p>104b.1</p>bcos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan zhes bya ba las/ skabs gsum pa'i 'grel pa'o// //thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gsum yongs su shes pa ni/ dbang du bya ba'i phyir yang rnam pa thams cad dang lam dang gzhi shes pa bsdu ba'i sgo nas/ thams cad
<p>104b.2</p>mkhyen pa nyid gsum sgom par byed pas/ rnam pa kun mngon par rdzogs par rtogs pa/ gzhi shes pa yi bye brag rnams/ /rnam pa zhes bya mtshan nyid de/ /kun mkhyen nyid ni rnam gsum phyir/ /de ni rnam pa gsum du 'dod/ /ces bya ba gsungs te/ 
<p>104b.3</p>rtag pa la sogs par 'dzin pa mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi gnyen po'i chos nyid kyi ngo bo nyid mi rtag pa la sogs pa la dmigs pa'i ye shes kyi bye brag rnams rnam pa nyid du rnam par gzhag pa ni mtshan nyid de/ de dag kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gsum gyi bye brag gis
<p>104b.4</p>rnam pa gsum kho nar bzhed do/ /rnam pa rnams spyir bstan nas/ da ni khyad par du/ med pa'i rnam pa nas bzung ste/ /mi g.yo ba yi rnam pa'i bar/ /bden pa so so la bzhi dang / /lam la de ni bco lngar bshad/ /ces bya ba gsungs te/ de la thams cad
<p>104b.5</p>shes pa nyid kyi dbang du byas nas/ med pa dang / mi skye ba dang / dben pa dang / mi brdzi ba dang / gnas med pa dang / nam mkha' dang / brjod du med pa dang / ming med pa dang 'gro ba med pa dang mi 'phrogs pa dang mi zad pa dang skye ba med pa'i rnam pa ste bcu gnyis
<p>104b.6</p>ni go rims bzhin du sdug bsngal la sogs pa'i bden pa gsum gyi/ mi rtag pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dag yin no/ /nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa'i gnyen po nyid du zag pa med pa'i lam gcig dang / thams cad shes pa nyid kyis rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang bsdus
<p>104b.7</p>pas de'i phyir de dag gi shes bya'i sgrib pa'i gnyen po nyid du bsgom pa'i lam zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa gnyis yin pas lam rnam pa gsum mo/ /de la dang po la byed pa po med pa dang / shes pa po med pa dang / 'pho ba med pa dang / 'dul ba med pa'i
<p>105a</p>
<p>105a.1</p>rnam pa ste/ bzhi ni go rims bzhin du lam la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dag yin no/ /gnyis pa la rmi lam dang / sgra brnyan dang / mig yor dang / smig rgyu dang / sgyu ma'i rnam pa ste lnga ni/ go rims bzhin du ngo bo nyid med pa dang / ma
<p>105a.2</p>skyes pa dang / ma 'gags pa dang / gzod ma nas zhi ba dang rang bzhin gyis mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtshan nyid spyir shes bya'i sgrib pa'i gnyen por gyur pa dag yin no/ /gsum pa la kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / gos pa med
<p>105a.3</p>pa dang / spros pa med pa dang / rlom pa med pa dang / mi g.yo ba'i rnam pa ste/ drug ni go rims bzhin du shes bya'i sgrib pa kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / nyon mongs pa'i bag chags dang / gzugs la sogs pa'i spros pa dang / rang gi
<p>105a.4</p>rtogs pa dang / yongs su nyams par rnam par rtog pa rnams kyi so sor nges pa'i gnyen por gyur pa dag yin no/ /de ltar na lam gyi bden pa la rnam pa bco lnga ste/ spyir na thams cad shes pa nyid kyi rnam pa nyi shu rtsa bdun yin no/ /de'i 'og tu lam shes pa
<p>105a.5</p>nyid kyi rnam pa/ rgyu dang lam dang sdug bsngal dang / /'gog pa la ni go rims bzhin/ /de dag brgyad dang bdun dang ni/ /lnga dang bcu drug ces bsgrags so/ /zhes bya ba gsungs te/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dang cig shos kyi phyogs la brten nas/ kun 'byung ba
<p>105a.6</p>dang / lam gyi bden pa dag ni rgyu yin la/ sdug bsngal dang 'gog pa'i bden pa dag ni 'bras bu yin par don gyi sgo nas bstan te/ kun 'byung ba dang / lam dang / sdug bsngal dang / 'gog pa'i bden pa la grangs bzhin du rnam pa brgyad dang zhes bya ba la sogs
<p>105a.7</p>pa khong du chud par bya'o/ /de la 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / mi gnas pa dang / zhi ba dang / 'dod chags med pa dang / zhe sdang med pa dang / gti mug med pa dang / nyon mongs pa med pa dang / sems can med pa'i rnam pa dag ni go rims bzhin du rgyu gang
<p>105b</p>
<p>105b.1</p>yin pa ste/ 'dun pa dang / 'dod chags dang / dga' ba dang / kun 'byung ba gang yin pa ste/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / rab tu skye ba gang yin pa ste/ kun du rtog pa dang / rkyen gang yin pa ste sems can du mngon par zhen pa/ de rnams
<p>105b.2</p>kyi gnyen por gyur pa gsum dang / gsum dang / gcig dang gcig ste/ de ltar na rgyu'i bden pa'i rnam pa brgyad yin no/ /tshad med pa dang / mtha' gnyis dang ma 'brel ba dang / tha mi dad pa dang / mchog tu 'dzin pa med pa dang / rnam par mi rtog pa dang / gzhal du
<p>105b.3</p>med pa dang / chags pa med pa'i rnam pa dag ni/ go rims bzhin du sems can thams cad la go skabs 'byed pa'i lam dang / ji ltar sems can thams cad la go skabs 'byed pa dang / rigs pa gang yin pa dang / ji ltar rigs pa yin pa dang / sgrub pa gang yin
<p>105b.4</p>pa dang / ji ltar sgrub pa yin pa dang / nges par 'byin pa gang yin pa de rnams kyi ngo bo nyid/ gnyis dang gnyis dang / gnyis dang gcig ste/ de ltar na lam gyi bden pa'i rnam pa bdun yin no/ /mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang bdag
<p>105b.5</p>med pa'i rnam pa dang / lnga pa mtshan nyid med pa'i rnam pa'i ngo bo nyid rnams te/ de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi bden pa'i rnam pa lnga yin no/ /'gog pa'i rnam pa'i ngo bo nyid ni nang dang phyi dang gnyis ka'i dngos po rnams dgag pas/ nang dang phyi dang gnyis ka stong pa nyid kyi rnam
<p>105b.6</p>pa ste gsum dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa'i ngo bo nyid btags pa'i bdag stong pa dang / snod kyi 'jig rten dang / don dam pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / rtag pa dang chad pa'i mtha' dang / 'khor ba thog ma dang tha ma med pa dang / rtogs pa'i chos
<p>105b.7</p>dor ba med pa la mngon par zhen pa dgag pas/ stong pa dang / chen po dang / don dam pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / mtha' las 'das pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa ste brgyad dang / gya nom pa'i
<p>106a</p>
<p>106a.1</p>rnam pa gzhan gyis kun brtags pa'i byed pa po dgag pas/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dang / nges par 'byung ba'i rnam pa yul du 'khrul pa'i bdag nyid brtags pa dang / mtshan nyid dang / dus su 'khrul pa rnams dgag pas/ chos
<p>106a.2</p>thams cad dang / rang gi mtshan nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa ste gsum dang nges par 'byung ba'i rnam pa kho na ngo bo nyid dgag pas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa gcig ste/ de ltar na 'gog pa'i bden pa'i rnam pa ni bcu drug yin la/ 
<p>106a.3</p>spyir na lam shes pa nyid kyi rnam pa sum cu rtsa drug yin no/ /de'i 'og tu rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa/ dran pa nyer gzhag nas bzung ste/ /sangs rgyas rnam pa'i mthar thug rnams/ /lam gyi bden pa'i rjes mthun par/ /kun mkhyen gsum du phye bas na/ /
<p>106a.4</p>slob ma byang chub sems dpa' dang / /sangs rgyas rnams la rim bzhin de/ /sum cu bdun dang sum cu bzhi/ /sum cu rtsa dgu dag tu bzhed/ /ces bya ba gsungs te/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nas bzung ste/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam pa'i mthar thug pa rnams ni thams
<p>106a.5</p>cad mkhyen pa nyid gsum gyis bsdus pa'i lam yin pa'i sgo nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis 'phags pa'i gang zag thams cad bsdus pa'i phyir/ grangs bzhin du nyan thos rnams la rnam pa sum cu rtsa bdun dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams la sum
<p>106a.6</p>cu rtsa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas rnams la sum cu rtsa dgur bzhed do zhes bya ba yin no/ /de la thams cad shes pa nyid la dang por dngos po la yongs su rtog pa'i lam la/ bden pa bzhi la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ lus dang / tshor ba dang / sems dang / chos rang 
<p>106a.7</p>dang spyi'i mtshan nyid kyis yongs su brtags pa dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i rnam pa bzhi'o de'i 'og tu zhugs pa la brtson 'grus 'byung bas rtsol ba las byung ba'i lam la mi dge ba dang dge ba skyes pa dang ma skyes pa dag go rims bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang mi bskyed pa
<p>106b</p>
<p>106b.1</p>dang / spel ba dang / bskyed pa'i rgyu'i brtson 'grus yang dag par spong ba'i rnam pa bzhi'o/ /brtson 'grus dang ldan pa ni sems las su rung ba nyid du byed pas/ ting nge 'dzin yongs su sbyong ba'i lam la/ 'dun pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / sems dang / dpyod pa'i
<p>106b.2</p>ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i rnam pa bzhi'o/ /sems yongs su sbyang ba byas pa la dro ba dang rtse mo'i sbyor ba 'byung bas mngon par rtogs par sbyor ba'i lam la dro ba dang rtse mo'i ngo bo nyid/ dad pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / dran pa dang / ting
<p>106b.3</p>nge 'dzin dang / shes rab kyi dbang po'i rnam pa lnga'o/ /dro ba la sogs pa thob pa la bzod pa dang chos kyi mchog 'byung bas mngon par rtogs pa dang 'brel ba'i lam la bzod pa dang chos mchog gi ngo bo nyid/ dad pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin
<p>106b.4</p>dang / shes rab kyi stobs kyi rnam pa lnga'o/ /dro ba la sogs pa bzhi rtogs pa la bden pa mthong ba'i lam 'byung bas/ mngon par rtogs pa'i lam la dran pa dang / chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / dga' ba dang / shin tu sbyangs pa
<p>106b.5</p>dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag gi rnam pa bdun no/ /bden pa mthong ba yongs su shes pa la bsgom pa'i lam 'byung bas/ rnam par dag par nges par 'byin pa'i lam la yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / rtog pa dang / ngag dang / 
<p>106b.6</p>las kyi mtha' dang / 'tsho ba dang / rtsol ba dang / dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad kyi rnam pa brgyad de/ de ltar na slob ma rnams la kun shes pa nyid kyi lam gyi rten can gyi rnam pa sum cu rtsa bdun yin no/ /lam shes pa nyid
<p>106b.7</p>la gnyen po'i lam/ /lta bas byas pa'i gnyen po dang / /de'i rgyu mtshan gyi rnam par rtog pa'i gnyen po dang / khams gsum pa la smon pa'i gnyen po zhes bya ba de lta bu'i ngo bo nyid la go rims bzhin du stong pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa'i ngo bo nyid ni rnam par thar pa'i
<p>107a</p>
<p>107a.1</p>sgo dang po'o/ /'gog pa dang / lam gyi bden pa'i rnam pa'i ngo bo nyid ni gnyis pa'o/ /mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / kun 'byung ba'i bden pa'i rnam pa'i ngo bo nyid ni gsum pa ste/ de ltar na rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum gyi rnam
<p>107a.2</p>pa gsum mo/ /sprul pa'i lam la/ gzugs kyi 'du shes rnam par ma bshig pa dang rnam par bshig pa'i phyir/ go rims bzhin du nang gzugs can dang gzugs can ma yin pas phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams la lta'o zhes bya ba sprul pa'i sgrib pa'i gnyen por rnam par
<p>107a.3</p>thar pa 'di gnyis dang / gzugs sdug pa dang mi sdug pa sprul pa la go rims bzhin du dga' ba dang mi dga' ba'i kun nas nyon mongs pa de dag gi gnyen por sdug pa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo lus kyis mngon sum du byas nas rdzogs par byas te/ gnas so zhes bya ba
<p>107a.4</p>rnam par thar pa gcig ste de ltar na rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnam pa gsum mo/ /mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa'i lam la thar pa dang mthun par gnas pa'i lam gyi rang bzhin la gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i rnam pa bzhi dang zhi bar gnas pa'i lam
<p>107a.5</p>gyi rang bzhin la 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa'i rnam pa gcig ste de ltar na rnam pa lnga'o/ /'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam la bsam gtan bzhi dang gzugs med pa dang 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag ste dgu'o/ /spong ba'i lam la bar chad med pa'i
<p>107a.6</p>lam gyi rnam pa bden pa bzhis bsdus pa nyon mongs pa dang mi ldan pa'i mtshan nyid bzhi'o/ /sangs rgyas nyid kyi lam la/ sbyin pa la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam pa bcu ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams la lam shes pa nyid kyi lam gyi rten can gyi
<p>107a.7</p>rnam pa sum cu rtsa bzhi'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rnam pa ni shin tu phul du byung ba'i phyir thun mong ma yin pa'i lam gcig pu kho na yin te/ de la ni gnas dang gnas ma yin pa dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa dang / mos pa sna tshogs dang / 'jig rten
<p>107b</p>
<p>107b.1</p>gyi khams du ma dang / dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa dang / thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa dang / 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba dang / zag pa zad pa mkhyen pa'i stobs kyi rnam pa bcu
<p>107b.2</p>dang / nga ni sangs rgyas so zhes bdag nyid zhal gyis 'ches pa dang / 'dod chags la sogs pa bar chad byed pa nyid du brjod pa dang / thams cad shes pa nyid la sogs pa'i lam nges par 'byung ba nyid du rab tu bstan pa dang / bdag nyid kyi zag pa zad pa nyid du zhal gyis
<p>107b.3</p>bzhes pa la rgol ba po med pas mi 'jigs pa'i rnam pa bzhi dang / rnam grangs dang / chos kyi mtshan nyid dang / yul gyi skad dang / chos rab tu dbye ba'i yul la go rims bzhin du chos dang / don dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa'i
<p>107b.4</p>rnam pa bzhi dang / 'khrul pa dang / ca co dang / dran pa nyams pa dang / thugs mnyam par ma bzhag pa dang / tha dad pa nyid kyi 'du shes dang / so sor ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms mi mnga' ba'i rnam pa drug dang / 'dun pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / dran
<p>107b.5</p>pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba las nyams pa mi mnga' ba'i rnam pa drug dang / sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi phrin las rnams ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i rnam pa gsum dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa
<p>107b.6</p>dang / da ltar byung ba la/ ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes kyi rnam pa gsum ste/ de ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi rnam pa dag dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bshad pa'i de bzhin nyid dang / chos thams cad la mnga' sgyur ba'i rang 'byung
<p>107b.7</p>dang / rnam pa thams cad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i sangs rgyas nyid kyi rnam pa gsum ste/ de ltar na sangs rgyas rnams kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam gyi rten can gyi rnam pa ni sum cu rtsa dgu'o/ /de la thams cad shes pa nyid kyi rnam pa ni nyan
<p>108a</p>
<p>108a.1</p>thos dang byang chub sems dpa'i bye brag gis/ go rims bzhin du zag pa med pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dag kyang yin no/ /lam shes pa nyid kyi rnam pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nyon mongs pa shin tu ma spangs pa'i phyir zag pa
<p>108a.2</p>dang bcas pa kho na yin no/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam gyi rnam pa ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa'i bag chags dang bcas te rnam pa thams cad du spangs pas chos thams cad la mnga' sgyur ba'i phyir zag pa med pa
<p>108a.3</p>kho na dag yin te/ rnam pa rnams gcig tu bsdoms na rnam pa brgya bdun cu rtsa gsum yod do/ /sbyor ba khyad par can dag gis rnam pa rnams bsgom dgos na de dag kyang sbyor ba po med par brjod par mi nus pas mnyan pa la sogs pa'i snod sbyor ba po/ sangs rgyas rnams
<p>108a.4</p>la lhag par byas/ /de la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun/ /dge ba'i bshes kyi mgon bcas pa/ /'di mnyan pa yi snod yin no/ /sangs rgyas bsten dang kun 'dri dang / /sbyin dang tshul khrims sogs spyod pas / /len dang 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i/ /snod du dam pa
<p>108a.5</p>rnams bzhed do/ /zhes bya ba gsungs te/ 'das pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams la spyir dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun cing sbyangs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la lus la sogs pa'i bsnyen bkur gyis mnyes par bya ba dang / the tshom gyi don yongs su 'dri
<p>108a.6</p>ba dang / sbyin pa la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bcu sgrub pa dang ldan pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag gis byin gyis brlabs pa rnams ni/ go rims ji lta bar rnam pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi yum 'di'i gzhung mnyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / don mi brjed pa dang / 
<p>108a.7</p>tshul bzhin yid la byed pa'i snod nyid yin par sangs rgyas la sogs pa bzhed do/ /de ltar sbyor ba po bstan nas sbyor ba/ gzugs la sogs la mi gnas phyir/ /de la sbyor ba bkag pa'i phyir/ /de yi de bzhin nyid zab phyir/ /de rnams gting dpag dka'
<p>108b</p>
<p>108b.1</p>ba'i phyir/ /de dag tshad ni med phyir dang / /tshegs chen yun rings rtogs pa'i phyir/ /lung bstan phyir mi ldog nyid dang / /nges 'byung bar chad med bcas dang / /byang chub nye dang myur ba dang / /gzhan don 'phel med 'grib med phyir/ /chos dang chos min sogs
<p>108b.2</p>mi mthong / /gzugs sogs bsam mi khyab mi mthong / /gzugs sogs de yi mtshan ma dang / /de yi ngo bo rnam mi rtog /'bras bu rin chen sbyin byed dang / /de ni dag pa mtshams dang bcas/ /zhes bya ba gsungs te/ gzugs la sogs pa la ngo bo nyid med
<p>108b.3</p>pa nyid kyis mi gnas pa dang / de dag la mi sbyor ba nyid sbyor ba yin pa dang / gzugs la sogs pa de dag nyid de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis zab pa dang / gting dpag dka' ba dang / tshad med pa zhes bya ba de ltar rtogs pa rnams kyi grangs bzhin du gzugs la
<p>108b.4</p>sogs pa la mi gnas pa dang / mi sbyor ba dang / zab pa dang / gting dpag dka' ba dang / tshad med pa'i sbyor ba ste lnga dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skrag pa dang mi skrag pa dang / yang dag par 'dzin pa dang / bar chad kyi chos spong ba dang / rtag
<p>108b.5</p>tu chos sgom pa dang / zag pa med pa'i chos gsar gyi rten nyid dang / 'bras bu chos kyi sku mngon par 'grub pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba dang / 'phel ba dang 'grib pa mi mthong ba dang / 'dod pa'i khams su mi dmigs pa dang / gzugs la sogs pa
<p>108b.6</p>bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rnam par rlom pa med pa dang / gzugs dang / de'i mtshan ma dang / de'i ngo bo nyid du rnam par mi rtog pa dang / 'bras bu dang po mthong ba dang / gzugs rnam par dag pa dang / lo skor du mngon par brtson pa mi 'dor ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sgrub pa
<p>108b.7</p>dang ldan pa rnams kyi go rims bzhin du/ tshegs chen pos yun ring po zhig nas mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / lung bstan pa 'thob pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa nyid dang / nges par 'byung ba dang / bar chad med pa dang / yang dag par mngon par rdzogs
<p>109a</p>
<p>109a.1</p>pa'i byang chub la nye ba dang / myur du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa dang / gzhan gyi don dang / 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa med pa dang / chos dang chos ma yin pa la sogs par mi dmigs pa dang / gzugs la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab
<p>109a.2</p>pa'i rnam pa 'gog pa dang / gzugs la sogs pa'i dngos por rnam par mi rtog pa dang / 'bras bu rin po che sbyin pa dang / rnam par dag pa dang / sa mtshams la sbyor ba dang rnam pa bco lnga ste sbyor ba nyi shu yin no/ /yon tan mthong ba sngon du btang na sbyor ba rnams la
<p>109a.3</p>shin tu goms par byed pas sbyor ba'i 'og tu de dag gi yon tan/ bdud kyi mthu bcom la sogs pa/ /yon tan rnam pa bcu bzhi'o/ /zhes bya ba gsungs te/ bdud kyi mthu bcom pa dang / sangs rgyas kyis dgongs shing mkhyen pa nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyis
<p>109a.4</p>mngon sum du mdzad pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye bar gyur pa dang / don chen po nyid la sogs pa dang / yul dpyad pa dang / zag pa med pa'i yon tan thams cad rdzogs pa dang / smra ba'i skyes bu nyid dang / mi phyed pa nyid dang / dge ba'i rtsa
<p>109a.5</p>ba thun mong ma yin pa skye ba dang / dam bcas pa'i don ji lta ba bzhin du sgrub pa dang / 'bras bu rgya chen po yongs su 'dzin pa dang / sems can gyi don sgrub pa dang / nges par 'thob pa zhes bya ba'i yon tan rnams te/ grangs bzhin du sangs rgyas rnams kyis byin
<p>109a.6</p>gyis brlabs pa dang / dgongs pa dang ye shes kyis gzigs pa dang / nye bar gyur pa dang / phan yon chen po dang / bya ba byed pa dang / gnyen po'i chos yongs su rdzogs pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi gtam brjod pa dang / grogs mdzad pa dang / 
<p>109a.7</p>dga' ba rgya chen po skyed pa dang / de'i dam bcas pa'i tshig la rjes su yi rang ba dang / chos zab mo mngon par 'dod pa dang / sems can gyi don byed pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshang bar rnyed pa zhes bya ba de dag phyin ci ma log pa'i sbyor ba la mngon par dga' ba
<p>109b</p>
<p>109b.1</p>la 'byung zhing 'thob pas yon tan bcu bzhi yin no/ /de'i 'og tu yang gang zhig yongs su spangs pas sbyor ba rnams bsgom par bya ba sbyor ba'i bar chad byed pa'i skyon gang dag cig yin zhe na/ de dag gi bar chad du 'gyur ba'i skyon/ skyon ni bcu tshan bzhir bcas pa/ /drug
<p>109b.2</p>tu nges par rtogs par bya/ /zhes bya ba gsungs te/ tshegs chen pos 'thob pa dang / /spobs pa ha cang myur ba dang / lus kyi gnas ngan len dang / sems kyi gnas ngan len dang / rigs pa ma yin pas bskyed pa'i kha don byed pa la sogs pa dang / phyir
<p>109b.3</p>phyogs pa'i rgyu mtshan 'dzin pa nyid dang / rgyu la mngon par zhen pa nyams pa dang / gya nom pa'i ro myang ba nyams pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du theg pa'i mchog kun du 'dzin pa nyams pa dang / rtag tu ched du bya ba nyams pa zhes bya ba ni bcu tshan dang po'o/ /rgyu dang
<p>109b.4</p>'bras bu 'brel pa nyams pa dang / gong na med pa nyams pa dang / yul rnam pa mang po la rnam par rtog pa'i spobs pa 'byung ba dang / yi ger 'dri ba la mngon par zhen pa dang / dngos po med pa la mngon par zhen pa dang / yi ge la mngon par zhen pa dang / yi
<p>109b.5</p>ge med pa la mngon par zhen pa dang / yul la sogs pa yid la byed pa dang / rnyed pa dang bkur sti dang tshigs su bcad pa'i ro myang ba dang / lam ma yin pas thabs la mkhas pa tshol ba zhes bya ba ni bcu tshan gnyis pa'o/ /grangs bzhin du nyan pa po dang 'chad
<p>109b.6</p>pa po dag snga ma dang phyi ma gang yang rung ba dang mngon par 'brel bas/ 'dun pa dang / snyom las kyis nyams pa dang / 'dun pa'i yul tha dad pas nyams pa dang / 'dod chen chung ba dang 'dod chen chung ba ma yin pa nyid kyis nyams pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan
<p>109b.7</p>dang ldan pa dang mi ldan pa dag dang / dge ba dang dge ba ma yin pa'i chos nyid dang / gtong ba dang ser sna byed pa dang / sbyin pa dang mi len pa dang / mgo smos pas go ba dang / rnam par spros pas go ba nyid dang / mdo la sogs pa'i chos mngon par shes pa dang
<p>110a</p>
<p>110a.1</p>mngon par mi shes pa nyid dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa dang / mi ldan pa zhes bya ba ni bcu tshan gsum pa'o/ /de kho na bzhin du thabs dang thabs ma yin pa la mkhas pa dang / gzungs thob pa dang ma thob pa dag dang / yi ger 'dri 'dod pa dang / yi ger 'dri
<p>110a.2</p>mi 'dod pa dag dang / 'dod pa'i 'dun pa dang bral ba dang ma bral ba nyid ces bya ba bzhi dang / ngan song gi 'gro ba la phyir phyogs pa dang / bde 'gror 'gro ba la yid bde ba ste gnyis dang / 'chad pa po dang nyan pa po dag snga ma dang phyi ma gang yang rung
<p>110a.3</p>ba 'brel pas grangs bzhin du gcig pu dang / 'khor la mngon par dga' ba nyid dang / go skabs mi 'byed pa nyid dang rjes su 'brel par 'dod pa nyid dang / zang zing cung zad tsam 'dod pa nyid dang / de sbyin par mi 'dod pa nyid dang / srog gi bar chad du 'gyur ba dang mi
<p>110a.4</p>'gyur ba'i phyogs su 'gro ba zhes bya ba bzhi ste/ bcu tshan bzhi pa'o/ /de bzhin du mu ge byung ba'i phyogs su 'gro ba dang mi 'gro ba dang / chom rkun pa la sogs pas dkrugs pa'i phyogs su 'gro ba dang mi 'gro ba dang / khyim lta bas yid mi bde ba zhes bya ba gsum dang / 
<p>110a.5</p>bdud kyis 'byed pa'i sbyor ba dang bcos ma nye bar sgrub pa dang / yul ji lta ba bzhin ma yin par dga' ba bskyed pa zhes bya ba gzhan gsum ste/ de ltar na skyon bzhi bcu rtsa drug yin no/ /go rims bzhin du yon tan dang skyon blang ba dang dor bas sbyor ba rnams bsgom par
<p>110a.6</p>bya ba ni mtshan nyid shes pa sngon du 'gro ba can yin pas skyon gyi 'og tu de dag gi mtshan nyid/ gang gis mtshon de mtshan nyid du/ /shes bya de yang rnam pa gsum/ /shes pa khyad par byed pa ste/ /ngo bo nyid gang mtshon bya yang / /zhes bya ba gsungs te/ byed
<p>110a.7</p>par sgrub pas 'dis sbyor ba rnams mtshon par byed pas na/ shes pa dang / khyad par dang / byed pa dang / las su sgrub pas de rnams mtshon par bya ba yin pas ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid de/ mtshan nyid ni rnam pa bzhir shes par bya'o/ /de la shes pa'i mtshan
<p>110b</p>
<p>110b.1</p>nyid thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gsum gyi dbye bas tha dad pa la/ re zhig thams cad shes pa nyid kyi sgo nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba dang / /'jig rten 'jig med bdag nyid dang / /sems can sems kyi spyod pa dang / /de bsdus pa dang phyir ltas dang / /
<p>110b.2</p>mi zad pa yi rnam pa dang / /chags bcas sogs dang rgya chen dang / /chen por gyur dang tshad med dang / /rnam shes bstan du med pa dang / /sems bltar med dang shes pa de/ /g.yo ba la sogs zhes bya dang / /de las gzhan yang de dag ni/ /de bzhin nyid
<p>110b.3</p>kyi rnam par shes/ /thub pas de bzhin nyid rtogs de/ /gzhan la bstan pa zhes bya 'di/ /thams cad shes pa nyid skabs kyi/ /shes pa'i mtshan nyid bsdus pa yin/ /zhes bya ba gsungs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba dang / 'jig rten 'jig pa med pa dang / 
<p>110b.4</p>sems can gyi sems kyi spyod pa dang / sems bsdus pa dang / sems rnam par g.yengs pa dang / sems mi zad pa'i rnam pa dang / sems 'dod chags dang bcas pa la sogs pa dang / sogs pa zhes bya ba'i sgras bsdus pa sems 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / 
<p>110b.5</p>sems rgya chen po dang / sems chen por gyur pa dang / sems tshad med pa dang / sems bstan du med pa dang / sems bltar med pa dang / sems g.yo ba la sogs pa dang / g.yo ba la sogs pa de bzhin nyid kyi rnam pa can dang / de bzhin gshegs pas
<p>110b.6</p>de bzhin nyid rtogs pa de gzhan la bstan cing btags pa zhes bya ba 'di rnams kyi shes pa'i rnam pa'i bye brag bcu drug gis / tshul bzhin du thams cad shes pa nyid kyi sbyor ba rnams ji lta ba bzhin mtshon pas na/ shes pa'i mtshan nyid thams cad shes pa nyid kyis bsdus
<p>110b.7</p>pa yin no/ /de'i 'og tu lam shes pa nyid kyi sgo nas/ stong nyid mtshan ma med bcas dang / /smon pa rnam par spangs pa dang / /skye med 'gag pa med sogs dang / /chos nyid rnam par 'khrug med dang / /'du mi byed dang rnam mi rtog /rab dbye mtshan nyid
<p>111a</p>
<p>111a.1</p>med nyid la/ /lam shes nyid kyi skabs kyis ni/ /shes pa'i mtshan nyid yin par bzhed/ /ces bya ba gsungs te/ stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / sogs pa zhes bya
<p>111a.2</p>ba'i sgras bsdus pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / dngos po med pa dang / ngo bo nyid dang / rten med pa dang / nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de drug dang / chos nyid rnam par 'khrug pa med pa dang / 'du mi byed pa dang / rnam par mi rtog
<p>111a.3</p>pa dang / rab tu dbye ba dang / mtshan nyid med pa zhes bya ba 'di rnams kyi shes pa'i rnam pa'i khyad par bcu drug gis ji lta ba bzhin du lam shes pa nyid kyi sbyor ba dag mtshon pas na shes pa'i mtshan nyid lam shes pa nyid kyis bsdus pa yin no/ /de'i 'og tu rnam pa thams cad
<p>111a.4</p>mkhyen pa nyid kyi sgo nas/ de ni nyid kyi chos rten nas/ /gnas dang gus par bya ba dang / /bla ma nyid dang mnyes pa dang / /de la mchod dang byed med dang / /kun du 'jug mkhyen gang yin dang / /ma mthong ston par mdzad pa dang / /'jig rten stong nyid rnam pa dang / /brjod
<p>111a.5</p>dang shes mdzad mngon sum mdzad/ /bsam mi khyab dang zhi nyid ston/ /'jig rten 'du shes 'gog pa la/ /rnam pa kun mkhyen tshul la ni/ /shes pa'i mtshan nyid ces bshad do/ /zhes bya ba gsungs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid kyi chos la mngon par brten
<p>111a.6</p>nas gnas pa dang / gus par bya ba dang / bla mar bya ba dang / mnyes par bya ba dang mchod pa dang byed pa med pa nyid dang / thams cad du 'gro ba dang / ma mthong ba'i don ston pa dang / 'jig rten stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dang / 'jig rten stong pa nyid du brjod pa dang / 'jig
<p>111a.7</p>rten stong pa nyid du shes par mdzad pa dang / 'jig rten stong pa nyid du mthong bar mdzad pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid du ston pa dang / zhi ba nyid du ston pa dang / 'jig rten 'gog pa dang / 'du shes 'gog pa zhes bya ba 'di rnams kyi shes pa'i rnam pa'i bye brag bcu
<p>111b</p>
<p>111b.1</p>drug gis ji lta ba bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sbyor ba dag mtshon pas na/ shes pa'i mtshan nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis bsdus pa yin no/ /de ltar bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa dgus shes pa'i mtshan nyid spyi'i ngo bo nyid du brjod
<p>111b.2</p>nas/ shes pa'i rnam pas yongs su bcad pa rnams kyi khyad par shes par bya ba yin pas shes pa'i mtshan nyid kyi 'og tu bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pas khyad par gyi mtshan nyid/ bsam mi khyab sogs khyad par gyis/ /khyad zhugs bden pa'i spyod yul can/ /
<p>111b.3</p>skad cig ma ni bcu drug gis/ /khyad par mtshan nyid bshad pa yin/ /zhes bya ba gsungs te/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / mi mnyam pa la sogs pa'i khyad par gyis khyad par du byas pa'i sdug bsngal la sogs pa'i bden pa'i yul can chos dang rjes su shes
<p>111b.4</p>pa'i bzod pa dang shes pa'i mtshan nyid bcu drug gis lam shes pa nyid la sogs pa'i sbyor ba dag mtshon pas na khyad par gyi mtshan nyid yin no/ /yang bsam gyis mi khyab pa la sogs pa'i khyad par gang yin zhe na/ bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa gsum po/ 
<p>111b.5</p>bsam mi khyab dang mi mnyam dang / /gzhal dang bgrang las yang dag 'das/ /'phags pa kun sdud mkhas pa yis/ /rig bya thun mong min shes nyid/ /shes myur bri dang gang med dang / /sgrub dang yang dag 'grub pa dang / /dmigs pa rten dang bcas pa dang / /
<p>111b.6</p>mtha' dag pa dang yongs 'dzin dang / /ro myang med dang khyad par ni/ /bcu drug bdag nyid shes bya ste/ /gang gis lam ni gzhan dag las/ /khyad du 'phags pas khyad par lam/ /zhes bya ba gsungs te/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la sogs pas legs
<p>111b.7</p>par yongs su bzung ba'i shes rab kyi stobs kyis bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid dang / mi mnyam pa nyid dang / gzhal ba las yang dag par 'das pa dang / bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa dang / 'phags pa'i gang zag thams cad sdud pa dang / skyes bu mkhas pas
<p>112a</p>
<p>112a.1</p>rig par bya ba nyid dang / nyan thos la sogs pa'i spyod yul ma yin pa'i dngos po yongs su shes pa dang / rang gi lugs la ltos pa'i mngon par shes pa shin tu myur ba'i shes pa dang / kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i bden pa la brten pa'i chos thams
<p>112a.2</p>cad bri ba med pa dang / gang ba med pa'i ngo bo dang / 'khor gsum rnam par dag pas sbyin pa la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug tu rab tu sgrub pa dang / yang dag pa'i sbyor bas bskal pa du mar bsgrubs pa'i bsod nams dang ye shes yang dag par 'grub pa dang / rnam
<p>112a.3</p>par mi rtog par chos thams cad la dmigs pa dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid byang chub sems dpa'i rten dang / smon lam la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyu'i tshogs pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis thabs kyis yongs su bzung ba
<p>112a.4</p>dang / mngon par zhen pa'i ro myang ba med pa dang bcu drug gi bdag nyid ces bya ba ni/ go rims bzhin du sdug bsngal la sogs pa'i bden pa'i skad cig ma rnams kyi khyad par yin te/ gang gis nyan thos la sogs pa'i lam rnams las byang chub sems dpa' la
<p>112a.5</p>sogs pa'i lam shes pa nyid la sogs pa gnyis ni/ khyad par gyi lam yin par khyad zhugs so/ /de'i phyir de dag gi ni ji skad bshad pa'i khyad par dang bral ba'i mngon par zhen pa la sogs pa skye ba'i mtshan nyid kyis go sla ba'i phyir ma bshad do/ /khyad par
<p>112a.6</p>gyi mtshan nyid kyis rnam par bcad pa rnams kyi byed pa gang yin zhe na/ bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyis byed pa'i mtshan nyid/ phan dang bde dang skyob pa dang / /mi rnams kyi ni skyabs dag dang / /gnas dang dpung gnyen gling dang ni/ /yongs 'dren
<p>112a.7</p>pa zhes bya ba dang / /lhun gyis grub dang theg gsum gyi/ /'bras bu mngon sum mi byed bdag /tha ma rten gyi mdzad pa ste/ /'di ni byed pa'i mtshan nyid yin/ /zhes bya ba gsungs te/ ma 'ongs pa'i phan pa dang / tshe 'di'i bde ba dang / sdug bsngal med pa'i rnam
<p>112b</p>
<p>112b.1</p>par smin pa ma yin pa'i chos nyid nye bar bsgrub pa'i don gyis/ thams cad shes pa nyid kyi phan pa la sogs pa'i byed pa gsum mo/ /gtan du phan pa dang / sdug bsngal gyi rgyu bzlog pa dang / 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa dang / rang dang
<p>112b.2</p>gzhan gyi don rtogs pa'i rten gyi ngo bo dang / gzhan gyi don sgrub pa dang / sems can gyi don lhun gyis grub par 'jug pa dang / theg pa gsum gyi nges par 'byung ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du mi byed pa zhes bya ba 'di rnams dus ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par nye bar sgrub pa'i
<p>112b.3</p>don gyis lam shes pa nyid kyi skyabs la sogs pa'i byed pa bdun no/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos thams cad ston pa nye bar bsgrub pa'i don gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la ni rten gyi mdzad pa gcig ste/ de ltar na byed pa'i rnam pa dag gis ji lta ba bzhin
<p>112b.4</p>du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gsum gyi sbyor ba dag mtshon pas na byed pa'i mtshan nyid yin no/ /byed pa'i mtshan nyid kyis shes par byas pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid gang yin zhe na/ bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa gsum gyis ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid/ nyon mongs rtags dang mtshan ma dang / /
<p>112b.5</p>mi mthun phyogs dang gnyen po dang / /dben dang dka' dang nges pa dang / /ched du bya dang mi dmigs dang / /mngon par zhen pa bkag pa dang / /dmigs pa zhes bya gang yin dang / /mi mthun thogs pa med dang de/ /gzhi med 'gro med skye med dang / /de bzhin nyid ni mi
<p>112b.6</p>dmigs dang / /ngo bo nyid bcu drug bdag nyid/ /mtshon cha lta bur mtshon pas na/ /mtshan nyid bzhi par bzhed pa yin/ /zhes bya ba gsungs te/ 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa dang / de'i rtags lus kyi gnas ngan len dang / de'i mtshan ma tshul
<p>112b.7</p>bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa la sogs pa dang / 'dod chags dang 'dod chags med pa la sogs pa mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang gnyen po dag stong pa nyid kyis thams cad shes pa nyid kyi dben pa'i ngo bo nyid bzhi'o/ /don dam par med pa'i sems can mya ngan las
<p>113a</p>
<p>113a.1</p>bzla bar dka' ba dang / theg pa gzhan du mi ltung ba'i mtshan nyid kyi mtha' gcig tu nges pa dang / yun ring po nas bsgrub par bya ba mchog nyid kyi ched du bya ba dang / bsgom par bya ba dang sgom pa po'i chos mi dmigs pa dang / dngos por
<p>113a.2</p>mngon par zhen pa mtha' dag bkag pa zhes bya ba de lta bu dag ni lam shes pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid lnga'o/ /thams cad shes pa nyid dang lam shes pa nyid kyis bsdus pa'i dngos po'i khyad par la dmigs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi sgrub pa'i 'dzin pa la sogs pa las bzlog ste
<p>113a.3</p>bstan pas mi mthun pa dang / gzugs la sogs pa thogs pa med par shes pa dang / shes bya dang shes pa mi dmigs pas gzhi med pa dang / de bzhin nyid kyis 'gro ba med pa dang / gzugs la sogs pa ngo bo nyid med pas skye ba med pa dang / dngos po
<p>113a.4</p>dang dngos po med pa la sogs pa gsum gyi ngo bo de bzhin nyid mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba de lta bu dag ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid bdun no/ /de ltar na ngo bo nyid bcu drug gis ji lta ba bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gsum gyi sbyor ba dag mtshan nyid dang
<p>113a.5</p>ldan pa bzhin du mtshon pas de ltar na bzhi pa ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid du bzhed do/ /de ltar na spyir gcig tu bsdoms na ni mtshan nyid dgu bcu rtsa gcig tu 'gyur ro/ /thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa kho na la ji skad bshad pa'i sbyor ba yongs su shes pa 'byung bas/ 
<p>113a.6</p>thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa/ mtshan med rab tu sbyin la sogs/ /yang dag sgrub la mkhas pa ni/ /rnam pa thams cad rtogs 'di la/ /thar pa'i cha dang mthun par 'dod/ /ces bya ba gsungs te/ mtshan ma med par/ dmigs pa'i shes pa'i rnam pas/ sbyin pa
<p>113a.7</p>la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la thug pa rnams rang gi rgyud la skyed par mkhas pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mngon par rdzogs par rtogs pa 'di la thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa yin par 'dod do/ /mkhas pa de gang yin zhe na/ de bstan pa'i
<p>113b</p>
<p>113b.1</p>phyir bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa/ sangs rgyas sogs dmigs dad pa dang / /sbyin sogs spyod yul brtson 'grus dang / /bsam pa phun tshogs dran pa dang / /rnam par mi rtog ting 'dzin dang / /chos rnams rnam pa thams cad du/ /shes pa'i shes rab dang rnam lnga/ /
<p>113b.2</p>rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnon po yis/ /rtogs sla rtul pos rtogs dkar bzhed/ /ces bya ba gsungs te/ dad pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab khyad par can/ dbang po'i ngo bo nyid ma yin pa grangs bzhin du/ sangs rgyas dang / 
<p>113b.3</p>sbyin pa dang / bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / rnam par mi rtog pa dang / chos thams cad kyi rnam pa thams cad yongs su shes pa la sogs pa'i yul rnam pa lnga la mkhas pa yin no/ /de lta mod kyi thams cad kyis bla na med pa'i byang chub 'thob pa ma yin te/ 'di ltar
<p>113b.4</p>dad pa la sogs pa chen po rnon pos ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rtogs par sla la/ de dag nyid rtul pos ni rtogs par dka'o zhes bya ba 'di ni chos nyid yin pas shugs kyis na 'bring po rnams kyis ni rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rtogs la/ chung ngu rnams
<p>113b.5</p>kyis ni nyan thos kyi byang chub rtogs so zhes bya ba 'di 'phangs pa yin no/ /thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa skyes pa'i spro ba can la nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa 'byung bas/ dro ba rnams kyi dmigs pa 'dir/ /sems can thams cad yin par bsngags/ /de dag nyid la sems
<p>113b.6</p>mnyam sogs/ /rnam pa dag ni bcur bshad do/ /bdag nyid sdig pa las ldog cing / /sbyin la sogs la gnas pas gzhan/ /de dag la ni 'god pa dang / /bsngags pa brjod dang mthun pa nyid/ /rtser gyur de bzhin bzod pa ni/ /rang gzhan rten can bden shes pa/ /
<p>113b.7</p>chos mchog de bzhin sems can rnams/ smin byed sogs kyis shes par bya/ /zhes bya ba gsungs te/ rnam pa thams cad mngon par rdzogs par rtogs pa 'di la mnyam pa dang / byams pa dang /phan pa dang / khong khro ba med pa dang / rnam par 'tshe ba med pa'i sems
<p>114a</p>
<p>114a.1</p>kyi rnam pa lnga dang / pha dang ma'i sems dang / spun dang sring mo'i sems dang / bu dang bu mo'i sems dang / bshes dang grogs kyi sems dang / gnyen dang snag gi gnyen mtshams kyi sems kyi rnam pa gzhan lngas/ sems can la dmigs
<p>114a.2</p>pa ni dro bar gyur pa yin par bzhed do/ /mdor na mi dge ba dang dge ba la grangs bzhin du spong ba dang len pa'i sgo nas ldog pa dang zhugs pa'i bdag nyid can/ de'i sgo nas gzhan rnams sdig pa las ldog pa dang / dge ba la gnas pa dag la sbyor ba'i rnam pa gnyis
<p>114a.3</p>dang / gzhan bdag nyid de bzhin nyid du zhugs pa la bsngags pa brjod pa dang / mthun par byed pa rnam pa gnyis po chos kyi rab tu dbye bas ni rnam pa mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba de rnams kyis sems can la dmigs pa ni rtse mor gyur pa yin no/ /rtse mor gyur pa la rang
<p>114a.4</p>dang gzhan gyi rten gyi dbye bas dmigs pa dang rnam pa dag ji lta ba de bzhin du sbyor ba dang bsngags pa brjod pa dang mthun pa nyid kyi rnam pa rnams kyis rang dang gzhan gyi rten gyi sdug bsngal la sogs pa'i bden pa la dmigs pa ni bzod pa yin no/ /snga ma bzhin du rang dang gzhan
<p>114a.5</p>gyi rten can kho na smin par byed pa dang grol bar byed pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa dag gis sems can la dmigs pa ni chos kyi mchog yin te/ de ltar na nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa yin no/ /rnam pa dang lam dang gzhi thams cad rnam par bsgom pa'i dbye bas go rims
<p>114a.6</p>bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la sogs pa mngon par rtogs pa rnam pa gsum la 'jig rten pa'i nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa rtogs pa sngon du 'gro bas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i mthong ba dang bsgom pa'i lam rtogs pa yin la rnam pa kun mngon par rdzogs
<p>114a.7</p>par rtogs pa la sogs pa gsum la ni bsgom pa gong nas gong gi gnas skabs kyi khyad par gyis/ rnam pa thams cad du khyad par gyi lam gyis bsdus pa'i ye shes zag pa med pa chung ngu dang 'bring dang chen po rim gyis skye ba yin pas cig car skye ba dgag par bya ba'i phyir
<p>114b</p>
<p>114b.1</p>nges par 'byed pa'i cha la sogs pa'i tha snyad du gsungs pa yin par shes par bya'o/ /phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun la ji skad bshad pa'i nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa 'byung bas phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun gyi mtshan nyid/ 
<p>114b.2</p>nges 'byed yan lag nas bzung ste/ /mthong dang goms pa'i lam dag la/ /byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gnas/ /de 'dir phyir mi ldog pa'i tshogs/ /zhes bya ba gsungs te/ dpa' bo gang dag nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa bzhi dang / mthong ba'i lam
<p>114b.3</p>dang bsgom pa'i lam 'chang bar 'gyur ba la/ de dang de rtogs pa'i tshul gyis gnas pa de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' slob pa phyir mi ldog pa'i dge 'dun yin no// //bam po bzhi pa / de rnams kyi mtshan nyid ma 'dres pa gang yin zhe na/ re zhig
<p>114b.4</p>bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa la gnas pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid/ gzugs la sogs las ldog sogs rtags/ /rnam pa nyi shur brjod pa yis/ /nges 'byed yan lag la gnas pa'i / /phyir mi ldog pa'i
<p>114b.5</p>mtshan nyid 'di/ /zhes bya ba gsungs te/ gzugs la sogs pa las ldog pa dang / the tshom med pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa/ rnam pa nyi shus nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa la gnas pa rnams kyi phyir mi ldog pa'i mtshan nyid shes par bya ba yin no/ /yang ldog
<p>114b.6</p>pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid de dag gang yin zhe na/ de dag bstan pa'i phyir bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa drug po/ gzugs la sogs las ldog pa dang / /the tshom mi ngal zad pa dang / /bdag nyid dge ba la gnas shing / /gzhan dag de la 'god 
<p>114b.7</p>pa dang / /gzhan gyi rten can sbyin sogs dang / /zab mo'i don la'ang som nyi med/ /byams lus sogs dang sgrib pa ni/ /rnam pa lnga dang mi 'grogs dang / /bag la nyal kun 'joms pa dang / /dran pa dang ni shes bzhin dang / /gos la sogs pa
<p>115a</p>
<p>115a.1</p>gtsang ba dang / /lus la srin bu rnams mi 'byung / /gya gyu med sems sbyangs pa ni/ /len dang ser sna med sogs dang / /chos nyid ldan par 'gro nyid dang / /sems can don du dmyal tshol dang / /gzhan gyis dkri bar mi btub dag /lam gzhan
<p>115a.2</p>nye bar ston bdud la/ /bdud ces bya bar rtogs pa dang / /sangs rgyas dgyes pa'i spyod pa ste/ /rtags ni nyi shu de dag gis/ /drod dang rtse mo bzod bcas dang / /chos mchog rnams la gnas pa ni/ /rdzogs pa'i byang chub las mi ldog /ces bya ba gsungs te/ ngo bo nyid
<p>115a.3</p>med pa nyid kyis gzugs la sogs pa'i chos las ldog pa dang / shes nas dad pa thob pas the tshom zad pa dang / smon lam grub pas log par lta ba dang / dmyal ba dang / yi dgas dang / dud 'gror skye ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi bka' mi thos pa dang / yul mtha'
<p>115a.4</p>'khob tu skye ba dang / dbang po ma tshang ba dang / glen pa dang / lkugs pa'i dngos po dang / lha tshe ring por skye ba zhes bya ba mi khom pa brgyad zad pa dang / snying rjes bdag dang gzhan dge ba'i chos la sbyor ba dang / bdag dang gzhan du brje ba nyid kyis sems can gzhan gyi yul la
<p>115a.5</p>yongs su bsngos pa'i sbyin pa la sogs pa dang / chos yang dag par rtogs pas zab mo'i don la yang som nyi mi byed pa dang / gzhan la phan pa nyid du zhugs pas byams pa'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las dang / sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pas sgrib pa lnga po/ 'dod
<p>115a.6</p>pa la 'dun pa dang / gnod sems dang / gnyid dang / rmugs pa dang / rgod pa dang / 'gyod pa dang / the tshom dag dang mi 'grogs pa dang / gnyen po rnam par bsgoms pa nyid kyis ma rig pa la sogs pa'i bag la nyal ba thams cad 'joms pa dang / rtag tu
<p>115a.7</p>mnyam par gzhag pa nyid kyis dran pa dang shes bzhin dang ldan pa dang / gtsang sbra kun du spyod pa nyid kyis gos la sogs pa yongs su spyod pa gtsang ba zhes bya ba rnam pa bcu gcig dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba 'jig rten las mngon par 'phags pa nyid kyis lus la srin bu'i
<p>115b</p>
<p>115b.1</p>rigs brgyad khri mi 'byung ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par dag pas sems gya gyu med pa dang / rnyed pa dang bkur sti la sogs pa la mi lta ba nyid kyis phyag dar khrod pa nyid la sogs pa sbyangs pa'i yon tan yang dag par len pa dang / sbyin pa la sogs pa'i khyad par
<p>115b.2</p>bsgrubs pas de dag dang 'gal ba ser sna dang 'chal ba'i tshul khrims la sogs pa med pa dang / chos thams cad yang dag par sdud pa nyid kyis chos nyid dang mi 'gal bar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan par 'gro ba dang / 'gro ba bdag nyid kyis byas pa nyid
<p>115b.3</p>kyis gzhan gyi don du dmyal ba 'dod pa zhes bya ba rnam pa drug dang / rtogs pa la yid ches pa'i chos nyid kyis gzhan gyis bkrir mi btub pa dang / sangs rgyas nyid kyi thabs shes pa la mkhas pa nyid kyis lam ltar bcos pa nye bar ston pa'i bdud la bdud nyid du rtogs
<p>115b.4</p>pa zhes bya ba rnam pa gnyis dang / 'khor gsum rnam par dag pas spyod pa thams cad la sangs rgyas dgyes pa zhes bya ba rnam pa gcig gis go rims bzhin du dro ba dang / rtse mo dang / bzod pa dang / chos kyi mchog rnams la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bla na med
<p>115b.5</p>pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa yin par rtags nyi shu po 'di dag gis shes par bya'o nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i phyir mi ldog pa'i mtshan nyid kyi 'og tu/ mthong ba'i lam gyi phyir mi ldog pa'i mtshan nyid bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis gsungs pa/ 
<p>115b.6</p>mthong ba'i lam la bzod pa dang / /shes pa'i skad cig bcu drug ni/ /byang chub sems dpa' mi ldog pa'i/ /mtshan nyid yin par shes par bya/ /zhes bya ba gsungs te/ sdug bsngal la sogs pa'i bden pa'i sgo nas/ chos dang rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa dang / 
<p>115b.7</p>shes pa'i skad cig ma bcu drug ni/ byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba'i lam la gnas pa rnams kyi phyir mi ldog pa'i mtshan nyid yin no/ /skad cig ma'i rnam pa ci 'dra ba zhig mtshan nyid yin zhe na/ rnam pa rnams bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa lngas gsungs pa ni/ 
<p>116a</p>
<p>116a.1</p>gzugs sogs 'du shes ldog pa dang / /sems brtan theg pa dman dag las/ /rnam log bsam gtan la sogs pa'i/ /yan lag yongs su zad pa dang / /lus sems yang ba nyid dang ni/ /'dod la spyod la thabs mkhas dang / /
<p>116a.2</p>rtag tu tshangs par spyod nyid dang / /'tsho ba rnam par dag nyid dang / /phung sogs bar chad byed rnams dang / /tshogs dang dbang sogs bcas pa yi/ /g.yul 'gyed ser sna la sogs la/ /sbyor dang rjes su sbyor ba yi/ /gnas pa so sor bkag pa dang / /chos ni rdul
<p>116a.3</p>tsam mi dmigs nyid/ /rang gi sa la nges pa nyid/ /sa gsum la ni gnas pa dang / /chos kyi don du srog gtong ba/ /de 'dra'i skad cig bcu drug ni/ /blo ldan mthong ba'i lam gnas kyi/ /phyir mi ldog pa'i rtags dag yin/ /zhes bya ba yin te/ rang gi mtshan nyid
<p>116a.4</p>stong pa nyid kyis gzugs la sogs pa'i chos su rtog pa las ldog pa dang / sangs rgyas la sogs pas byin gyis brlabs pas bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi sems brtan pa nyid dang / theg pa chen po'i chos khyad par can bsgrubs pas/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi
<p>116a.5</p>theg pa las sems rnam par log pa dang / chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'i mthus bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la sogs par skye ba'i yan lag yang dag par yongs su zad pa zhes bya ba bzhi ni sdug bsngal gyi rnam pa yin no/ /mi dge
<p>116a.6</p>ba dang bral ba nyid kyis lus dang sems yang ba dang / sems can gdul ba'i thabs la mkhas pa'i mthus mngon par zhen pa med par 'dod pa la nye bar spyod pa dang / yul gyi nyes dmigs mthong bas rtag tu tshangs par spyod pa nyid dang / skyes bu dam pa'i chos nyid kyis
<p>116a.7</p>'tsho ba'i yo byad yang dag par rnam par dag pa nyid ces bya ba bzhi ni kun 'byung ba'i rnam pa yin no/ /stong pa nyid la gnas pa nyid kyis phung po dang / skye mched dang / khams rnams la sbyor ba dang rjes su sbyor ba dag tu mi bya'o zhes/ de ltar sbyor ba dang rjes su sbyor ba'i gnas pa
<p>116b</p>
<p>116b.1</p>so sor bkag pa dang / mi mthun pa'i phyogs bsal ba nyid kyis rtogs pa'i bar chad byed pa'i tshogs rnams la snga ma bzhin du sbyor ba dang rjes su sbyor ba'i gnas pa so sor bkag pa dang / rnam par rtog pa'i skyon yongs su shes pa nyid kyis byang chub kyi tshogs sbyin pa la
<p>116b.2</p>sogs pa la snga ma bzhin du sbyor ba dang rjes su sbyor ba'i gtam la gnas pa so sor bkag pa dang / gzung ba dang 'dzin pa dag spang bar bya ba nyid kyis dbang po dang rten grong khyer la sogs pa'i g.yul 'gyed pa snga ma bzhin du sbyor ba dang rjes su sbyor ba'i gnas pa rjes su bkag pa
<p>116b.3</p>zhes bya ba bzhi ni 'gog pa'i rnam pa yin no/ /sbyin pa la sogs pa'i khyad par rtogs pas ser sna dang 'chal ba'i tshul khrims la sogs pa la sbyor ba dang rjes su sbyor ba'i gnas pa so sor bkag pa dang / chos thams cad rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum gyi ngo bo nyid yin pas
<p>116b.4</p>rtogs pa'i chos rdul tsam yang mi dmigs pa dang / mngon par yid ches pa thob pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gsum gyi bdag nyid kyi rang gis gsum la ji lta ba bzhin du nges pa nyid kyis gnas pa dang / gcig tu gzhol ba nyid kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
<p>116b.5</p>la sogs pa'i chos kyi don du srog gtong ba zhes bya ba bzhi ni lam gyi rnam pa yin te/ de ltar na bzod pa dang shes pa'i skad cig ma rnam pa bcu drug gis bsdus pa 'di rnams yang dag par thob pa na/ dag pa 'jig rten pa gzung ba dang 'dzin par mngon par ma zhen pa'i rnam pa
<p>116b.6</p>can rjes kyi sems kyis bsdus pas rang dang mthun pa'i 'bras bu gzugs la sogs pa'i 'du shes bzlog pa la sogs pa bskyed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba'i lam la gnas pa'i phyir mi ldog pa'i mtshan nyid dag yin no/ /rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi tha snyad ni
<p>116b.7</p>sems can gdul ba'i dgos pa'i dbang ma gtogs par thams cad du rtogs pa dang mthun pa kho na yin no zhes shes par bya ba'i phyir nye bar btags nas bshad de / de lta ma yin na rnal 'byor pa'i rgyud la so so rang gis rig pa'i skad cig ma rnams ji ltar gzhan yid ches
<p>117a</p>
<p>117a.1</p>par byed pa'i mtshan nyid dag yin/ de'i 'og tu bsgom pa'i lam la gnas pa'i phyir mi ldog pa'i mtshan nyid yin pa las/ lugs las khyad par ma bzung bar khyad par can gyi blo mi skye'o zhes 'byung ba'i phyir re zhig bsgom pa'i lam gyi khyad
<p>117a.2</p>par/ bsgom pa'i lam ni zab pa ste/ /zab mo stong pa nyid la sogs/ /zab pa de ni sgro 'dogs dang / /skur pa'i mtha' las grol ba nyid/ /ces bya ba gsungs te/ stong pa nyid la sogs pa la yang gzugs med la/ stong pa nyid la sogs pa gzugs
<p>117a.3</p>las gzhan pa yang ma yin pas/ go rims bzhin du stong pa nyid la sogs pa la sgro 'dogs pa dang skur pa'i mtha' las grol ba nyid gang yin pa de ni zab mo ste/ stong pa nyid la sogs pa yin la/ zab mo nyid dang ldan pa'i phyir bsgom pa'i lam zab pa yin no/ /de ltar
<p>117a.4</p>khyad par bstan nas khyad par gyi gzhi/ nges 'byed yan lag dang mthong ba'i/ /lam dang bsgom pa'i lam nyid la/ /yang dang yang du sems pa dang / /'jal dang nges rtog bsgom pa'i lam/ /zhes bya ba gsungs te/ thos pa dang bsams pa dang bsgoms pa las byung
<p>117a.5</p>ba'i shes rab dag gam/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sbyor ba dang dngos dang rjes las byung ba'i shes rab kyis/ go rims bzhin du nges par 'byed pa'i yan lag la sogs pa gsum la nges par mthong ba'i don yang dang yang du sems pa dang / 'jal ba dang nges par rtog pa dag ni
<p>117a.6</p>bsgom pa'i lam rgyun chags pa yin no/ /de rnam pa du zhig ce na/ de ni rgyun chags yin pa'i phyir/ /chung dang 'bring dang chen po rnams/ /chung ngu'i chung sogs dbye ba yis/ /rnam pas rnam pa dgur bzhed do/ /zhes bya ba gsungs te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
<p>117a.7</p>kyi nyon mongs pa ni rnam par rtog pa'o zhes 'byung ba'i phyir/ mun pa shin tu chen po ni snang ba chung ngus sel la/ chung ngu ni chen pos sel to zhes bya ba'i dpes rnam par rtog pa chen po dang 'bring dang chung ngu rnams re re zhing / chen po dang 'bring dang chung ngu'i bye brag gis tha dad pa'i phyir/ 
<p>117b</p>
<p>117b.1</p>de dag gi gnyen po chung ngu dang 'bring dang chen po rnams kyang re re zhing chung ngu dang 'bring dang chen po'i bye brag gis tha dad pa'i phyir de ltar na don dam par stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyi rnam pa'i sgo nas rnam par rtog pa'i gnyen po'i dbye ba las grangs bzhin du/ 'dod pa'i khams
<p>117b.2</p>la sogs pas dgu dag tu rnam pa dgu rgyun chags su 'byung ba'i phyir/ bsgom pa'i lam yin no/ /rgyal ba'i yum de dang de las rnam pa re re'i dbang du mdzad de/ bsod nams grangs med pa dang / gzhal du med pa dang / tshad med pa skye bar gsungs pa'i phyir bye brag
<p>117b.3</p>rnam pa mang ba ma yin nam/ ji ltar rnam pa dgu zhes bya zhe na/ grangs med la sogs bstan pa rnams/ /dam pa'i don du bzod ma yin/ /kun rdzob tu ni thugs brtse ba'i/ /rgyu mthun de dag thub pa bzhed/ /ces bya ba gsungs te/ grangs med pa dang / gzhal
<p>117b.4</p>du med pa dang / tshad med pa bstan pa tshig tu brjod pa'i ngo bo rnams kyis ni/ don dam par na bsgom pa'i lam ji skad bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can don gcig tu rab tu sbyar ba la ldog pa la ltos nas nye bar bskyed pa'i tha dad pa nyid kyi ngo bor dbye bar bya ba bzod pa ma yin no/ /
<p>117b.5</p>kun rdzob tu ni bshad pa'i chos kyi ngo bo nyid ji skad bshad cing bstan pa de dag byis pa'i skye bo rnams la 'bras bu chen po skye ba rab tu ston pa nyid kyis dmigs pa med pa'i thugs rje chen po'i rang bzhin gyi chos kyi dbyings kyi rgyu mthun par gyur pa yin par de bzhin gshegs pa bzhed
<p>117b.6</p>pas mang po nyid du thal bar mi 'gyur ro/ /stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyis goms pa phul du byung ba byar med pa ma yin nam/ de'i phyir cung zad kyang mi byed pa kho na'o snyam pa'i skye bo blo dman pa'i ngor dogs pa bsu bar/ dngos po brjod du med pa la/ /nyams pa dang ni
<p>117b.7</p>'phel mi rung / /bsgom zhes bya ba'i lam gyis ni/ /ci zhig nyams shing ci zhig 'thob/ /ces bya ba gsungs te/ chos nyid kyi rang gi ngo bor 'dod pa'i lam gyi dngos po/ ngo bo nyid med pa nyid kyis yang dag par na de nyid dang / gzhan nyid dang gnyis ka dang gnyis ka ma
<p>118a</p>
<p>118a.1</p>yin pa nyid du brjod du med pa la sgom pa phul du phyin par byar med pa'i phyir/ mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang gnyen po dag go rims bzhin du 'bral ba dang skye bar mi rung ngo / /de bas na sgom pa zhes bya ba'i lam gyis mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi ngo bo ni ci zhig
<p>118a.2</p>por rnam par byang ba ni ci zhig 'thob ste/ cung zad kyang mi byed pa nyid pas nye bar dgod par mi bya ba kho na'o zhe na/ de lta ma yin te/ 'di ltar/ byang chub ji lta de bzhin du/ /'di ni 'dod pa'i don sgrub byed/ /byang chub de bzhin nyid mtshan nyid/ /de yang de yi mtshan nyid
<p>118a.3</p>bzhed/ /ces bya ba gsungs te/ ji ltar khyad par du byar med pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi byang chub spros pa med pa'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid chos kyi sku la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gyi sangs rgyas kyi bdag po tsam gyis/ gdul bya'i skye bo rnams kyi bsod nams dang ye shes kyi rjes su
<p>118a.4</p>mthun par don khyad par can snang ba'i sems bskyed pa'i sgo nas mngon par 'dod pa'i don byed pa de bzhin du/ bsgoms pas glo bur gyi dri ma dang bral ba'i sgo nas mngon sum du byas pa'i lam de bzhin nyid kyi mtshan nyid 'di yang kun rdzob tu mngon par 'dod pa'i don gyi bya ba byed
<p>118a.5</p>do/ /don dam par ni nyams pa dang 'phel ba dgag pa'i tshul du bzhed pas de'i tshe sbyor ba med pa nyid sbyor ba yin pa'i phyir nyes pa med do/ /de lta yin na yang kun rdzob tu yang don byed par mi rung ngo snyam pa'i dogs pa bsu bar/ sems ni snga mas byang chub par/ /rigs
<p>118a.6</p>min phyi mas kyang ma yin/ /zhes bya ba gsungs te/ snga phyir gyur pa'i sems re re la sangs rgyas kyi byang chub sgrub par byed pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la sogs pa'i don mtha' dag mi snang ba'i phyir/ re res byang chub par ni rigs pa ma yin no/ /'dod pa'i don
<p>118a.7</p>sgrub par byed pa snang ba'i sems cig car byung ba mang po nyid kyis kyang ma yin te/ sems can rnams ni rnam par shes pa'i rgyud re re ba'o zhes 'byung bas mi srid pa'i phyir ro/ /bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi byang chub sgrub par byed pa dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la sogs pa sangs
<p>118b</p>
<p>118b.1</p>rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar rtogs par 'gyur ba'i rang gi ngo bo rim gyis 'byung ba sems byung ba snga phyir gyur pa mang po nyid kyis kyang ma yin te/ de byung ma thag tu rjes su 'gro ba med pa nyid du 'jig pas na phan tshun 'brel pa med pa'i phyir ro/ /de bas na ji ltar don khyad
<p>118b.2</p>par can snang ba'i sems bskyed pa'i sgo nas don byed ce na/ de ni yang dag pa ma yin pas/ mar me'i dpe yi tshul gyis ni/ /zab mo'i chos nyid rnam pa brgyad/ /ces bya ba gsungs te/ ji ltar me lce dang snying po phrad pa'i skad cig ma dang po la/ rang gi rgyus phan tshun gyi
<p>118b.3</p>sgo nas dus mnyam du phrad pa bskyed pas khyad par can du ma byas pa'i phyir/ skad cig ma gnyis pa med par rgyu dang 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid sreg par byed pa dang / bsreg par bya ba med la/ de bzhin du me lce dang snying po khyad par can skye ba skad cig ma gnyis pa la yang / rtag tu
<p>118b.4</p>yod pa la sogs par thal bar 'gyur bas skad cig ma dang po med par/ kun rdzob tu yang 'byung ba med pa'i phyir/ rgyu dang 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid sreg par byed pa dang / bsreg par bya ba med do/ /gang gi phyir de lta yin pa de'i phyir gang gi tshe rkyen nyid 'di pa tsam gyi bdag
<p>118b.5</p>nyid kyi rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos nyid kyis ma brtags gcig pur nyams dga' ba nyid du rgyu dang 'bras bu 'brel pa'i stobs kyis gnyis ka phrad pa'i khyad par can gyi skad cig dang po la ltos nas/ des byas pa mthu phul du phyin pa dang ldan pa'i khyad par can skad cig ma
<p>118b.6</p>gnyis pa la sogs pa yod na/ de'i tshe rgyu med par zhig kyang rgyu dang 'bras bu dag go rims bzhin du dus mnyam du skye ba dang 'jig par dmigs pas/ sreg par byed pa dang bsreg par bya ba yod do/ /de bas na skad cig ma dang pos kyang skad cig ma gnyis pa la ma ltos 
<p>118b.7</p>par snying po ma bsregs la skad cig ma gnyis pas kyang me lce'i skad cig ma dang po la ma ltos par snying po ma bsregs pa zhes bya ba mar me'i dpe'i tshul skad cig ma snga phyir gyur pa gnyis yul gcig la nye bar sbyor ba shes par byed pa lhur len pas/ skad cig ma snga ma bzhin
<p>119a</p>
<p>119a.1</p>du byang chub sgrub par byed pa dngos po tshad yod pa zhig snang ba'i rnam par shes pa snga ma la brten nas/ de la snang ba'i don gyis dben pa lhag par khyad par du 'phags pa'i don snang ba'i rnam par shes pa phyi ma skye bas byang chub 'thob par rigs so/ /
<p>119a.2</p>ji skad smos pa'i dpe kho nas zab mo'i chos nyid rnam pa brgyad kyang khong du chud par bya ba yin pas/ bsgom pa'i lam la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid brjod pa'i phyir/ zab mo rnam pa brgyad yul gang la yin zhe na/ skye ba dang ni 'gag
<p>119a.3</p>pa dang / /de bzhin nyid dang shes bya dang / /shes dang spyod dang gnyis med dang / /thabs mkhas pa la zab pa nyid/ /ces bya ba gsungs te/ skad cig snga ma dang phyi ma dag gis kyang ma yin ngo bo nyid med pas kyang ma yin la sgom pas rtogs par bya ba'i don khyad par du
<p>119a.4</p>'phags pa bskyed do zhes bya ba rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / dngos po thams cad byung ba nyid nas rang bzhin gyis ngo bo nyid med la kun rdzob tu yang 'gag go zhes bya ba 'gag pa dang / gnas skabs thams cad du de bzhin nyid goms kyang de mngon du mi byed ces bya ba de
<p>119a.5</p>bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi chos thams cad la sbyin pa la sogs pa rnam pa du ma rjes su sgrub pa zhes bya ba shes bya dang / de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis mthong ba med pa nyid mthong ba yin no zhes bya ba shes pa dang / chos nyid kyis thams cad la spyod pa med
<p>119a.6</p>pa nyid spyod pa'o zhes bya ba spyod pa dang gnyis su med pa'i ngo bo nyid du thams cad sgrub po zhes bya ba gnyis su med pa dang / tshogs thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa la de'i 'bras bu sangs rgyas nyid mi thob zhes bya ba thabs la mkhas pa ste/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rnam par
<p>119a.7</p>thar pa thob pa'i sgo nas phan tshun 'gal ba'i don sgrub pas zab pa nyid yin no/ /slob pa phyir mi ldog pa'i tshogs mtshan nyid dang bcas pa bshad zin to/ /slob pa'i tshogs kyi chos thob pa sangs rgyas nyid thob par bya ba'i phyir 'bad pas/ sangs rgyas nyid 'thob pa'i rgyu
<p>119b</p>
<p>119b.1</p>mtshan 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa mnyam pa nyid/ chos rnams rmi lam 'dra ba'i phyir/ /srid dang zhi bar mi rtog pa/ /las med la sogs klan ka yi/ /lan ni ji skad bshad par zad/ /ces bya ba gsungs te/ 'khor ba dang rnam par byang ba mi mthun pa
<p>119b.2</p>dang gnyen po rnams snang brnyan tsam gyi ngo bos rmi lam dang 'dra ba nyid du rtogs pa'i phyir 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa dag la tha dad pa nyid du rnam par mi rtog pas na mnyam pa nyid do/ /rmi lam dang 'dra ba nyid yin na mi dge ba bcu dang sbyin pa la sogs pa med pas/ 
<p>119b.3</p>gnyid ma log pa'i gnas skabs na yang gnyid log pa'i gnas skabs bzhin du 'gyur ba ma yin nam zhes bya ba'i klan ka rnams kyi lan ni/ ji ltar phyi rol gyi don du smra ba'i lugs la skad cig ma nyid kyis rgyu med par 'jig pa yin la/ grub pa'i mtha' las kyang / 
<p>119b.4</p>'jig rten sna tshogs las las skyes/ /zhes 'byung ba'i phyir/ don dam par sus kyang su yang bsad pa med/ ma bsad pa yang ma yin/ sus kyang su'i nor blangs pa yang med/ ma blangs pa yang ma yin/ zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i phyogs la rgyun 'jug pa dang
<p>119b.5</p>'gal ba'i dngos po bskyed pa la gsod pa la sogs par rtog pa'i sgo nas/ tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa la mi dge ba la sogs pa dang 'dra bar srog gcod pa la sogs pa rnam par 'jog pa de bzhin du/ dngos po rmi lam dang 'dra
<p>119b.6</p>yang phyin ci log gi 'ching ba mtha' dag ma nyams pa rnams la de dang mthun pa'i don gyi dngos po la sogs pa la mngon par zhen pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i lan de dang de phyogs gzhan nas gsungs so zhes bya bar khong du chud par bya'o/ /gzhan yang / rmi lam sems
<p>119b.7</p>ni gnyid kyis nyams/ /des na 'bras bu 'dra ma yin/ /zhes bya bas dpe ma grub po/ de bzhin du rmi lam na yang dge ba dang mi dge ba spyad pa ni/ sad pa'i gnas skabs na kye ma byas so legs par byas so zhes rjes su yid rang na/ rjes kyi gnas skabs kyi
<p>120a</p>
<p>120a.1</p>sems kyis mngon par zhen pa'i gsos kyis yongs su gsos te/ de'i phyir yang dpe ma grub pas 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa ni mnyam pa nyid do/ /gnyis ka mnyam pa nyid du rnam par bsgom pa ni rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du sangs rgyas
<p>120a.2</p>su 'gyur bas/ de'i 'og tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa/ sems can 'jig rten de bzhin du/ /snod kyi 'jig rten ma dag pa/ /de la dag par bsgrub pa yis/ /sangs rgyas zhing ni dag pa nyid/ /ces bya ba gsungs te/ sems can dang snod kyi 'jig
<p>120a.3</p>rten gyi bye brag gis/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam pa gnyis la go rims bzhin du bkres pa dang skom pa dang / rdo ba dang tsher ma la sogs pa nyid kyis ma dag pa gang yin pa de'i gnyen por lha'i nye bar spyad pa dang / gser gyi sa phyogs la sogs pa dag pa bskyed pa'i sgo nas
<p>120a.4</p>rnam par dag pa ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa'o/ /rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa bsgrubs pa ni thabs mkhas pas skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bya dgos pas thabs la mkhas pa/ yul dang sbyor ba can 'di ni/ /dgra rnams las
<p>120a.5</p>ni 'das pa dang / /mi gnas ji bzhin shugs dang ni/ /thun mong ma yin mtshan nyid dang / /ma chags pa dang mi dmigs dang / /mtshan ma smon lam zad pa dang / /de yi rtags dang tshad med pa/ /thabs la mkhas pa rnam pa bcu/ /zhes bya ba gsungs te/ bar
<p>120a.6</p>chad kyi chos las yang dag par rgal bas lha la sogs pa'i bdud las 'das pa dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid rnam par bsgoms pas mi gnas par gnas pa dang / smon lam grub pas gzhan gyi don sngon gyi shugs kyis 'phags pa byed pa dang / dka' ba
<p>120a.7</p>spyod pa thams cad shin tu goms pa nyid kyis thun mong ma yin pa dang / chos dkar po rnam par dag pas chos thams cad la 'dzin pa med pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid kyis mi dmigs pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa nyid kyis mtshan ma
<p>120b</p>
<p>120b.1</p>med pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa nyid kyis smon pa med pa dang / dri ba sngon du btang ba can phyir mi ldog pa'i chos brjod pas phyir mi ldog pa'i rtags dang / yul thams cad shes pa nyid kyis tshad med pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yul rnam pa
<p>120b.2</p>bcu mngon sum du bya ba la dus dang dus ma yin pa shes pa'i sbyor ba ni thabs la mkhas pa yin no/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i man ngag gi bstan bcos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan ces bya ba las/ skabs bzhi pa'i 'grel pa'o// //rnam pa thams cad
<p>120b.3</p>mngon par rdzogs par rtogs pa thob pa la/ rab kyi mthar phyin pa'i rtogs pa 'byung bas/ go sla bar bya ba'i phyir rtags la sogs pa bsnyad pa sngon du 'gro ba'i rtse mo'i mngon par rtogs pa/ rmi lam na yang chos rnams kun/ /rmi lam lta bur lta la sogs/ /rtse mor
<p>120b.4</p>phyin pa'i sbyor ba'i rtags/ /rnam pa bcu gnyis dag tu bzhed/ /ces bya ba gsungs te/ shin tu goms pa'i phyir rmi lam gyi gnas skabs na yang chos thams cad rmi lam dang 'dra ba la sogs par lta ba dang / nyan thos la sogs pa'i sa la dga' ba'i sems mi bskyed
<p>120b.5</p>pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa mthong ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa dmigs pa dang / chos ston pa'i sems skye ba dang / dmyal ba la sogs pa'i sems can mthong ba sngon du 'gro ba rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du ngan song spong ba
<p>120b.6</p>rjes su dran pa dang / grong khyer la sogs pa tshig pa rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs grub pa dang / gnod sbyin la sogs pa mi ma yin pa med par byed pa'i bden pa'i tshig grub pa dang / rang nyid mngon par shes pas pha rol gnon pa'i dge ba'i bshes
<p>120b.7</p>gnyen bsten pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa dang / chos thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la nye bar gyur pa zhes bya ba rnam pa bcu gnyis ni rtse mo'i mngon par rtogs pa thob pa'i gnas
<p>121a</p>
<p>121a.1</p>skabs kyi khyad par gyi rtags yin no/ /de ltar rtags kyis mtshon pa'i rnam par 'phel ba rnam pa du zhig yod ce na/ rnam par 'phel ba/ 'dzam bu gling gi skye bo snyed/ /sangs rgyas mchod pa'i dge la sogs/ /rnam mang du ni dper mdzad
<p>121a.2</p>nas/ /rnam 'phel bcu drug bdag nyid do/ /zhes bya ba gsungs te/ 'dzam bu'i gling la sogs pa stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can snyed kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bas lhag pa dang / khyad par du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yid
<p>121a.3</p>la byed pa dang / mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa dang / byang chub par bya ba dang byang chub par byed pa'i chos rnams mi dmigs pa dang / dge ba bcu la sogs pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa thob pa las khyad par du 'phags pa dang / lha'i ris
<p>121a.4</p>thams cad nye bar 'ong ba dang / bdud thams cad zil gyis gnon pa dang / ston pa dang 'dra bar skye bo la mtshungs par gnas pa zhes bya ba bsod nams rnam pa brgyad dang / yang rnam pa thams cad du thabs la mkhas pas bslab pa yongs su dag pa dang / sangs rgyas
<p>121a.5</p>kyi rigs can du 'gyur ba dang / 'bras bu sangs rgyas nyid 'thob pa'i rgyu mtshan dang / pha rol tu phyin pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi sems mi skye ba dang / gzugs la sogs pa dang ldan par rtogs pa'i sems rab tu mi skye ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa kun bsdus pa shes pa
<p>121a.6</p>dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad 'thob pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la nye bar gyur pa zhes bya ba bsod nams gzhan rnam pa brgyad dang / me tog la sogs pas sangs rgyas mchod pa'i dge ba la sogs pa rnam pa mang po dper mdzad nas gong nas gong
<p>121a.7</p>du khyad par du 'phags pa nyid kyis gnas skabs bcu drug gi ngo bo nyid ni rnam par 'phel ba yin no/ /de ltar rnam par 'phel bas rnam par spel ba'i rang dbang du gyur pa mthar phyin pa'i mtshan nyid rnams ni nges par brtan pa yin pas nges par brtan pa/ kun mkhyen nyid
<p>121b</p>
<p>121b.1</p>gsum chos rnams kyi/ /yongs su rdzogs pa bla med pa/ /sems can don yongs mi gtong ba/ /brtan pa zhes ni mngon par brjod/ /ces bya ba gsungs te/ de ltar yang dag pa'i thabs la mkhas pa'i stobs kyis rnam par mi rtog pa rtogs pa'i gnas skabs na/ 
<p>121b.2</p>snying rje chen po mngon du byed pa'i ngo bos sems can gyi don yongs su mi gtong ba'i mtshan nyid/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la sogs pa ji skad bshad pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gsum gyi chos sems bskyed pa la sogs pa gong du smos pa rnams yongs su rdzogs pa bla na
<p>121b.3</p>med pa ni nges par brtan pa yin no/ /de ltar nges par brtan par byed pas nges par brtan par 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid ni sems kun du gnas pa yin pas sems kun du gnas pa/ gling bzhi pa dang stong dag dang / /stong gnyis gsum dag dper mdzad nas/ /bsod nams mang
<p>121b.4</p>po nyid kyis ni/ /ting 'dzin yongs su bsgrags pa yin/ /zhes bya ba gsungs te/ tshad srid pa ni srang tshad kyis gzhal bar nus so zhes bya ba'i tshul gyis gling bzhi pa la sogs pa stong gsum pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams kyis pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa thams cad
